Summary: I am extremely saddened to be treated with such disrespect, even after I did my best to be reasonable. They gave me room 150 during my 16th to 20th of february stay. Both the bathroom and half the actual bedroom flooded with water from the shower plumbing and apparently even from water from the upper rooms. Large amounts of water seeped up from the laminated floor and walls. On the front desk they told me they would change the room on the next day, and they didnt. I had to place towels all over the floor endibg up with what I can just describe as a pool of wet towels for a floor all over the bathroom and part of the bedroom. I had to stay 3 nights tolerating being told that they simply couldnt give me another room and that "they could just check me out" if I wanted. They finally

This is not what La Quinta typically provides. This is not a hotel, it’s a dirty motel with understaffed front desk, stains in blankets, marks in the bathtub, doorknobs falling out of doors and bathroom doors that barely shut. I booked 5 nights and only stayed 1 out of necessity for having arrived late and needing a place to stay. Shirtless/shoeless people working on cars in the parking lot. VERY MISLEADING pictures online. Outdoor cement hallways/staircases were very stained and gross. Room smelled a bit. Lobby wreaked of smoke. Shocked that this place has the name La Quinta

The Staff wasn't ready for Early arrival at 2 pm as the Wyndham's said it would be available. They were un prepared to to give me my room after 5 pm and asked me to wait in the lobby. The room was nice and indicative of La Quinta comfort, I liked the room.

Everything about my stay here was terrible. First, they changed my room last minute to a completely different one to the one I had originally reserved. Then, they gave me one next to another room where they played loud music all night and the staff did nothing about it, even though they were notified. I would really not recommend anyone, specially if traveling for business purposes, to stay in this place.

Summary Heading: Worst hotel stay of my life. Dirty & disgusting.
Summary: The room was filthy. The front desk didn't speak or understand English. We only saw one worker the entire stay & he wouldn't room move us or give us clean towels or do anything to fix our issues. Cockroaches in the lobby the front desk clerk did nothing about. I am appalled at how terrible this place is. Prostitutes all over the place. The noise from the traffic is so loud you can't hear the TV. I've never had a more terrible hotel stay than I have at this place. Worst place ever. I though la quinta had higher standards but apparently it's just a cheap place for hookers. The 'hot breakfast' they serve is just prepackaged pastries in raisin flavor & that's it! I was so disappointed. I would just comdemn this place it was so terrible.

I booked a room on the Wyndham Hotel website and guaranteed the room rate and reservation with a credit card.  When I arrived a short time later the person at the desk at check-in refused to honor the rate and proceeded to charge me an extra $9 saying that it was for County tax.  There is no County room tax only in 8% city tax which was included what I paid online. Wyndham customer service was of little assistance. They said I would hear back from them within a week and it's been 12 days and nothing.

Summary Heading: Costa Mesa - La Quinta I n
Summary: Do not stay here!! It’s the worst hotel experience I have ever had. Dirty, smelly and does not have breakfast like it states on the site. The rating is a ZERO not even a one star. The room have a smell

I travel a lot for work and choose my hotels carefully. They advertised that they have a fitness center, but they didn't have one. Very disappointing news to here off the bat. Free breakfast the next morning? terrible coffee and  bad pastries. Not enough towels and no lotion. Not one Do Not Disturb signs. Mild dank smell in the bathroom.The front desk buy was a dullard. Not coming back for sure.
Room tip: No Fitness Center as advertised,  "Free Breakfast" is misleading.

Summary Heading: If minus points could be given....
Summary: No hot breakfast, rooms were unclean, people not friendly, juice and coffee were old, noise abounds, place is very unattractive.  Nothing about this place was good.  At least the internet worked.  I would urge you to find other lodging in the area.  I'm trying to get some refunding of my money because this was such a dump.

I had to play musical rooms right from the start  #1 was way too stinky even though we asked for non- smoking, #2 the toilet failed to flush within 10 mins of our stay. # 3 was not at all just right. It was also stinky. When I asked for more pillows- I was given a set of sheets. I was told that they don't have extra pillows. When I went in for breakfast, the coffee was disgusting and all they offered was sweet rolls.  Nothing fresh at all. The hotel is near the highway and you can hear the traffic in a closed room from bed. The clerk who was rude btw never mentioned  when check out was. At Noon a man and woman showed up at my room while I was trying to pack my luggage. They were very rude. I do not recommend this hotel.

Summary Heading: Quiet with easy access to the freeway
Summary: Our room was dirty, plumbing was backed up, some of the outlets didn't work but we had clean sheets. If it's a last minute room, it's ok but you might want to check out other rooms. Booked the room months in advance and was overcharged upon check in. Be careful and definitely bring footwear to walk around in the room. My husband's feet turned gray after a few steps. But the staff are decent and when I informed the front desk of the sink and tub being backed up, it was fixed before we got back to the room.

Summary Heading: Worst hotel stay in a long time
Summary: When I extended my stay they had to take my deposit a second time.  When I asked to speak to the Manager, he was very rude.  They have lots of homeless sleeping in their parking lot, so coming out of their vehicles at all times of the night. I mentioned this three times to management.  Coffee wasn’t made two mornings and I had to wait a very long time.   The heat wasn’t working, so the room was very cold.  Never book this hotel!

Freeway noise was overwhelming.  Smoke smell lingers even though all rooms are non-smoking. Needs ozone deodorization.  Breakfast was a joke. Insufficient electrical outlets. Needs larger and fluffier bath towels.

Summary Heading: Dirty and not true the breakfast
Summary: Dirty and not true the breakfast, wouldn't recommend stay here. Too long to get my deposit back, after a week. The room was full of hair when I arrived. There were flyng bugs in the whole room, had to throw away my pizza. Mediocre breakfast, it is a lie what they advertise about the hot breakfast, it is just the coffee.

I had to leave on second day due to dirty sheets and cockroaches in room, in addition they charged me for the entire stay, still dealing for my reimbursement. Please spend 20 dlls more and avoid this hotel.

The room looked like it was not cleaned. There was hair in the shower, on the floor, and on the bathroom counter. Sheets were stained and had hair. Pillows were covered in sweat stains. Luckily I had disinfecting wipes in my car so we wiped everything down. Ending up buying our own sheets and pillow cases. Located right next to the freeway and the door didn’t seal all the way so it was really loud all night. There was people doing drugs in different spots around the property. There’s a motel 6 down the street that is significantly cleaner

Summary Heading: Dirty hotel, cockroach in the bathroom
Summary: This was the dirtiest hotel I have ever encountered. The photos on their direct website are false, they look nothing like the room. Dirty bed sheets, towels, and floors. There was a cockroach in the bathroom. Front Desk Staff were very unprofessional. Wyndham seriously needs to look at disenfranchising this location.

Dirty linens, beds were just remade from previous occupants. Load, right next to the freeway. What do you expect for the price. Some unsavory people walking around the property all night long. They do allow pets which is a positive for me.

Summary Heading: Crime scene at this La Quinta property in Costa Mesa CA
Summary: This La Quinta property in Costa Mesa CA is a daily crime scene and should be closed down.  Daytime crime on the La Quinta property tolerated by staff; Front office staff with complete disregard for guest safety; Hazardous and broken furnishings in room; Filthy room; Missing castor on chair risking serious head injury as chair tips over against desk; No Microwave, no refrigerator, no phone, no coffee maker, no clock, no shampoo, 1 tiny bar of soap; Filthy breakfast area with put of coffee only - no other breakfast items.  A La Quinta hotel guest was going door-to-door peddling food stamps for sale to other guests.  Stolen equipment was being offered for sale to drivers on hotel property parking areas.  Wrecked vehicles with broken glass on the ground were being stored in the

Summary Heading: Dirty place with no house keeper with broken bed
Summary: Dirty sheet no house keeper always short of staff accidentally change me twice never give me my refund. Broken bed folded bathroom and manager recommended to use out side bathroom. All items on roo. Not working properly. Never find the front desk

Find other place, don't be fooled by their discounts or Offer! .. In fact they're truly Cheap, dirty and no professional staff.  Their manager is so proud to be the "Hotel Guru" master in hotel industry, This is how he introduced himself to me, Acted so rudely and so disrespectful.

Summary Heading: Better off sleeping in your car
Summary: Less than clean room and bathroom, 1/2 inch gap in entry door.  Noise from major freeway that is literally 100 feet from the room.  Hotel staff indifferent.  Refrigerator inoperative. List goes on It says I need more characters, they really don’t want me to go on!

Summary Heading: Sleepless night in a filthy hotel!!!
Summary: We drove 5 hours and it was late and we were ready for a good night's sleep.  Wrong! Our room smelled and it was used! Fresh ice in ice bucket, bed was used, trash, dirty towels, filthy tub. Overall discusting!!!  Front desk just wanted to give us a clean sheet and said they had no other rooms. After being firm, They ended up giving us another room. But we could not sleep, afraid to get beg bugs. Started coughing...unclean AC unit? Couldnt wait for morning. Sleepless night in a filthy hotel!!!

Room was dirty. Bedding was stained. A/C unit was leaking so the floor was wet and we were afraid to turn it on. When I went back to the front desk I was told they couldn't do anything, including move me to another room because it took me too long to come back to let them know. It took me time because I called the corporate office. Cold water in shower was not working so it was scalding hot. Beyond disappointed! I've stay in $50 hotel rooms that were better.
Manager Response: Hi Demara, We are very sorry to hear that you had so many issues during your recent stay. Our primary goal is always to exceed expectations of comfort, convenience, and quality amenities. For that reason, we certainly take this very seriously and have forwarded your comments to management for review. We apologize for all the inconveniences that you faced and hope we will have another opportunity to host you more successfully in the future.  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary: We enjoyed our stay.  Room was clean and beds were comfortable.  Even though I was told there was no microwave or refrigerator we had both in our room.  Breakfast was very minimal, sweet rolls, coffee and juice.  Ask for a room away from the noisy freeway.  We will stay there again if in the Costa Mesa area.
Manager Response: Hey Karen, Thank you for the positive rating. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are glad that you found the room clean and the beds comfortable, and we hope the availability of a microwave and refrigerator in the room was convenient for you. Your comment about breakfast is duly noted, and we are sorry that it fell short of your expectations. We do review our breakfast offering regularly, and we will take your feedback into consideration when next doing so. As for the external noise, as you rightly pointed out, we can try our very best to assign prospective guests quieter rooms facing the backside, should they give us a call ahead of time. We are happy to know that we remain your accommodation of choice here for future visits, and we look forward to having you back soon for another pleasant stay during your next trip to the area.  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary: Single women travelers probably should not stay here. Rooms accessed by exterior doors facing parking lot in an industrial area. Window screens torn or ripped. Felt too unsafe to stay here. Pictures do not reflect the property.
Manager Response: Hi Jessica, We are very sorry to read your review of our hotel. Our guests' safety and security are our top priorities; thus, we certainly take this very seriously and have forwarded your comments to management for review. We hope you will give us another chance down the road as we are eager to make this right!  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary: Dirty room, bad smell, sink didn’t work. Bathroom had mold. One of the lights didn’t work. Floor was dirty and noticed there was hair inside my bed before I layed down. Employees here are unapologetic, & have no sense of care ect.  I could see many improvements, by far one of the worst hotels I visited.
Manager Response: Dear guest, We appreciate that you have taken the time to let us know how you perceived our accommodation and find your review very disappointing. While it is somewhat discouraging, feedback such as yours helps us to improve our product and service. We will take all of your observations in relation to our staff and property and attempt to make several improvements for the enjoyment of our future guests. Thank you for your business and your review. We sincerely hope that you will give us a chance to redeem ourselves with you and restore your faith in our hotel and hospitality.  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary: The room was filthy, bugs, sink was plugged, TV wouldn't turn on for starters.  Graffiti, no electrical outlet covers, etc.  Was charged $50 for incidentals.  I was there less than an hour and told the front desk it was too dirty to stay.  They 'cancelled' the reservation, no questions asked.  A week later, they still charged my credit card the $50 and refuse to answer their phone.  Wouldn't stay here for free!
Manager Response: Dear guest, We are sorry to hear that you chose not to stay with us recently. Our aim is to provide a clean, comfortable and pleasant place to stay, and we sincerely apologize that our hospitality and attention to detail left something to be desired in this case. Guest satisfaction is important to us, and we will take all of your observations in relation to our hotel and attempt to make several improvements for the enjoyment of our future guests. Sorry to hear that you are waiting for your deposit to be refunded to you. We have noted your concern and alerted our team to your comments. Please rest assured that deposits are refundable if there are no incidental charges or damages to the property. Thank you for considering our hotel for your stay in Costa Mesa and for taking the time to post your review. We regret that our accommodation was not suitable for your needs, but we appreciate you staying with us on this visit.  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary: Rooms were filthy, bathtub looked like a murder scene, front desk were rude, smelled of cigarette smoke and was non smoking. Breakfast was a joke and they had the audacity to charge 6 bucks extra a day per person.
Manager Response: Hi Gilbert, We are very sorry to hear that you had so many issues during your recent stay. We apologize for the aspects of your visit that did not impress you, and we regret any inconvenience caused. Please rest assured that we will take all of your observations in relation to our service and property and attempt to make several improvements for the satisfaction of our future guests. Furthermore, we will see to it that our housekeeping team does a better job of preparing/airing out the rooms moving forward. As for breakfast, we do review our breakfast offering regularly, and we will take your feedback into consideration when next doing so. Thank you for considering our accommodation for your stay in Costa Mesa and for taking the time to post your review. We know we can do better, and it would be an honor to have a chance to redeem ourselves with you and restore your faith in our hotel and hospitality.  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary: The water pressure in the shower was bad. The tub was apparently clogged because the water drained so slow that there was standing water around your feet. The TV was broken in my room and the hotel pool was closed by the health department so we couldn't swim. No breakfast either. Overall a waste of money.
Manager Response: Hi Adriane, It is noticeable that we have failed to meet your expectations on this visit, and we regret the poor experience during your recent stay. Your comfort and satisfaction are of the utmost importance to us, and we have noted all your concerns for the betterment of the guest experience. We also want you to know that certain services and amenities, including food and beverage offerings, may be reduced or unavailable at the moment due to COVID-19 precautions. This is to limit personal contact and minimize viral risks during the pandemic. Thank you for considering our accommodation for your stay in Costa Mesa and for taking the time to post your review. We appreciate both and hope we will have the opportunity to host you more successfully in the future.  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary: never stay this place even if you get free or discounted rate, they mention about the breakfast but not single item was available they lie on website, even no one show up to clean your room until the check out i stay three nights and mention and requested for clean the room but no one stop by
Manager Response: Dear guest, We are very disappointed to learn about your recent experience at our hotel. We are sorry that your stay fell short of your expectations, and we deeply regret any inconvenience caused. We appreciate your voicing your concerns to us, as this allows us the opportunity to improve future guest satisfaction. We hope you will give us another chance down the road as we are eager to make this right!  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary Heading: Dont stay here or with Wyndham hotels anywhere!
Summary: I had stayed here several years ago and I have trusted the La Quinta name in the past. This recent stay however was one of the most disgusting experiences I have ever had. Totally run down with stained mattresses and from the start where they try to add another "service charge" on top of the previously agreed total cost. Horrible room with black cold in the bathroom dirty floors, crummy thin bedding. Got very little sleep due to neighbor noises. Front desk doesn't care. The "to go" breakfast is a joke --some mangy looking cake with horrible coffee. I will never stay with anybnhoetel that is owned by Wyndham again. The whole thing is disgraceful.
Manager Response: Hi Robert, We are very sorry to hear that you were so disappointed with your stay at our hotel. It certainly does not sound as if you had the experience that we strive to provide for our guests, and we sincerely apologize for any failure in delivering on our commitment to provide you with a clean, comfortable, and pleasant place to stay. We take guest feedback very seriously, and we will put all your comments to good use for the improvement of our product and service. We also want you to know that we certainly understand that any unexpected fees can be an inconvenience, so we do our very best to make sure that all information is clear. All our fees are always disclosed, so it is strange that any particular charge came as a surprise to you. Thank you for your business and your review. We appreciate both and wish you nothing but pleasant travels ahead.  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary: If I could leave a 0/5 star review I would, this hotel is the worst I’ve ever stayed at, the floor was disgustingly sticky and dirty the day we checked in, there were bugs and we asked for them to clean the floor properly and didn’t do it until the 3rd day even if we asked everyday and they promised they would, we talked to other people and they also had the same issues. On the website the had pictures of an American breakfast with waffles and lots of food but there was nothing except some coffee, watered down juice, no tables of chairs and if your lucky a muffin or two, when we went to go talk to them they removed the pictures from the website and that they were sorry but that was the breakfast they offered. The bathroom walls have mold, the bathtub doesn’t drain properly,

Stay away, this place is a crime scene like literally a memorial in the parking with two crosses next to each other. rooms are a disgust and uh morning breakfast, yeah cold nasty coffee and a hard wrap expired bread, hope you enjoy. Customers Service, they all from India so good luck with that, I made a 3 day reservation and left the next day with no refund , they want to keep all your money it's all a scam. I figured my life is worth more than $300. Hotels.com you suck

Summary Heading: No Mansgementcon Duty to deal with overbooming issues.
Summary: Staff was unable to make adjustments to their overbooking pre-paid visitors. No There was never was a Manaher on Duty.  Not Disability Friendly.  Rooms are "well' used.  Frankly, we were seriously dissapointed with most every aspect of this stay.

Summary Heading: You DO NOT want to stay here
Summary: I usually don't write reviews, especially bad ones, but I've been coming to this hotel for years and they recently started changing things up because new management. First off, the room rate has gone up and it is not worth it for a hotel like this. They now charge a $50 deposit and every day you stay you have to pay it again, then you have to wait 2-4 weeks to receive it back on your card, so if you stay 4 days be prepared to pay a $200 deposit and not receive it back for 2-4 weeks. The rooms are extremely humid and stink, the toilet paper is thinner than any I have ever seen, and they don't have tissue, the beds are cheap and uncomfortable, bedding is dirty, prepare to get bit up, they give you thin dirty towels and only 2 per room, even if you have a double bed, prepare to pay
Manager Response: Hi Lola, We appreciate that you have taken the time to let us know how you perceived our accommodation and find your review very disappointing. Our primary goal is always to exceed expectations of comfort, convenience, and quality amenities. For that reason, we certainly take this very seriously and have forwarded your comments to management for review. Furthermore, we will conduct an investigation within our housekeeping departments to correct any lapses in current cleaning standards. Additionally, we will conduct a full review of our current pest-control procedures to ensure that the issue with pests does not arise again. As for the deposit, like any other hotel across the US and around the world, we charge a deposit for the incidentals that may occur during your stay. If not utilized, this amount is released immediately at check-out, subject to a quick inspection of the room. Thank you for considering our accommodation for your stay in Costa Mesa and for taking the time to post your review. We know we can do better, and it would be an honor to have another chance to change your perception and restore your faith in our hotel and hospitality.  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary Heading: screwed up my reservation, nasty room
Summary: I requested a non-smoking room with a king bed and got a room with two fulls that reeked of cigarettes and weed. I honestly wouldn't stay at this hotel again if you paid me to. The staff said the hotel was full, so there were no other options.
Manager Response: Dear guest, We are sorry to hear that you did not receive the room type that you were looking for, and we regret this aspect of your visit that marred the overall experience for you. Please know that when you book a room on a third-party channel such as Expedia, Hotels.com, Priceline, Booking.com, Hotwire, or others, the room type is never guaranteed. Rather, you get to make a preference, which is subject to the hotel's availability after direct bookings are assigned their guaranteed room types. We do recommend prospective guests to book via the hotel's brand website or call the hotel directly to guarantee a particular room type. We are saddened to read that you feel that you wouldn't stay with us again. We are sure that you will not have the same experience on another occasion, and we hope you will reconsider. We look forward to an opportunity to redeem ourselves with you and delight you with a superior experience during your next trip to the area.  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary: This was a most unpleasant experience.  Checked in at 4 pm. Room not ready. We were asked to return in 45 min. Room was said to be ready but the bathroom was not done. Housekeeping came to fix that. We found the pool had been shutdown by the Health Dept. we saw bugs in the room. The hotel did not appear to be very clean. There was no coffeemaker in the room, Front desk said due to Covid, and coffee would be available at breakfast. Breakfast consisted of 1 urn regular coffee, (no decaf, no hot water or teabags) one choice of prepackaged sweet roll, apple and orange juice dispenser. That’s all!  Coffee put away at nine am. Had 12 day reservation beginning Saturday. On Sunday evening I asked desk clerk what their policy was to leave early with no penalty as we did not want to pay

Doors are paper thin. You hear every noise outside. Older men stand outside smoking all day and night, watched my friend and i leave and come back to our hotel room. 3 different knocks at the door at 1am. Room was disgusting. Shower was disgusting. Lobby doesn’t answer when you call. I pray you do not stay here.

Summary Heading: Horrible do not use this hotel
Summary: I put this room 6 months in advance. I had booked the handicapped disabled room because I am handicapped. This room is not set up that way. When we arrived we showed up a couple hours early and we were told it would be an extra $50 if we wanted to check in at that time we said no we would be back. When we came back several hours later and checked in we were never told anything about the breakfast or any of the features of the hotel. They just checked us in told us our room number until the swear it was. There was no handicap parking right in front of the room. When we went into the room we noticed that the bed was very high off the floor which if your handicapped and you can't maneuver very well you can't get on the bed very well. The bathroom had four small towels and when I

The place was very dirty the elevators the stairs and outside of the place the dogs have been peeing inside the elevators outside on the steps on the walls it smelled so bad then couldn't get anybody to speak English to us to give us a set of towels and even when we spoke Spanish to them they completely ignored us. On top of that we had to go get an extra garbage bag because the garbage was overflowing in the room for 2 days they wouldn't even come and clean the room. Truthfully I'd give the whole place to zero if I could

Property was dirty, run down, and old.  Room keys had to be rekeyed because the front desk wrote down the wrong room number.  Mold in the shower, floors were dirty so your feet were black on the bottom. Supposed to be breakfast which consisted of a pot of old coffee and what I think was a sweet roll. I can’t be too sure about that though.  They never came to clean the room or bring fresh towels the whole time we were there. I would strongly advise anyone NOT to waste your time or money on this property!!
Manager Response: Hi Helen, We are very sorry to hear that you were so disappointed with your stay at our hotel. It certainly does not sound as if you had the experience that we strive to provide for our guests, and we sincerely apologize for any failure in delivering on our commitment to provide you with a clean, comfortable, and pleasant place to stay. We take guest feedback very seriously, and we will review all your comments in detail and attempt to make several improvements for the enjoyment of our future guests. We also want you to know that we have temporarily suspended daily housekeeping services for stay-over guests (i.e., not making beds or cleaning rooms unless specifically requested). However, upon request, a change of linens, towels, toiletries, etc., will be made available. Also, certain services and amenities, including food and beverage offerings, may be reduced or unavailable at the moment due to COVID-19 precautions. We regret the inconvenience caused, but this is to limit personal contact and minimize viral risks during the pandemic. Thank you for considering our accommodation for your stay in Costa Mesa and for taking the time to post your review. We appreciate both.  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary Heading: Very sketchy location and dirty floors
Summary: We arrived late at night and were offered a ground level room.  I was traveling with my kids and did not feel safe at a ground level room.  I requested a 2nd level room and the floors were so dirty.  We did not realize this until my daughters feet were black.  I will not stay here again.  Id rather pay more and feel safe and clean.
Manager Response: Hi Louette, We appreciate that you have taken the time to let us know how you perceived our accommodations and find your review very disappointing. We take upkeep and cleanliness very seriously, and our staff generally does a great job when it comes to maintaining our hotel and preparing the rooms for upcoming guests, so it is strange that this happened. Please know that we will look into this and see to it that our staff does a better job of cleaning the floors moving forward. We also want you to know that our guests' safety and security are our top priorities; thus, we would like to know in more detail about your insecurities so that we can take corrective measures for the satisfaction of our future guests. We are saddened to read that you feel that you wouldn't stay with us again. We are sure that you will not have the same experience on another occasion, and we hope you will reconsider. We look forward to an opportunity to redeem ourselves with you and restore your faith in our hotel and hospitality.  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary: Wasnt clean. breakfast was a danish. didnt get cleaned all four days of my trip. door was broken. wanted to charge me $30 to check in 30 minutes early. repeatedly told me they would service my room and did not!
Manager Response: Dear guest, It is noticeable that we have failed to meet your expectations on this visit, and we sincerely apologize for any failure in delivering on our commitment to provide you with a clean, comfortable, and pleasant place to stay. Guest satisfaction is important to us, and rest assured that we will take all of your observations in relation to our service and property and attempt to make several improvements for the enjoyment of our future guests. We sincerely hope you will give us another chance down the road, as we are eager to make this right!  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary Heading: Stay away from the Costa Mesa La Quinta
Summary: Dirty, stinky, mattress had a dent in it I informed the attendant about the conditions. He offered to move to another room. The place needs to be condemned. The daily rate was $165night. I wouldn't stay there for free. Demanded a refund and checked out.
Manager Response: Dear guest, We are very sorry to hear that you chose not to stay with us recently. We take upkeep and cleanliness very seriously, and your room should always feel fresh and clean. Our staff generally does a great job when it comes to maintaining our hotel and preparing the rooms for upcoming guests, so it is strange that this happened. We appreciate you making us aware of this, and rest assured that we will conduct an investigation within our housekeeping department to correct any lapses in current cleaning standards. Thank you for considering our accommodation for your stay in Costa Mesa and taking the time to post your review. We appreciate both.  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary Heading: Disgusting, dirty, mildew, mold, smelly, loud
Summary: Location is so close to the 405 that you can hear the deafening sounds of traffic all day/night Lobby - old, smelly, depressing Check-in - slow, no internet check-in available as advertised Elevator is outside building, smelled of urine Room, dirty, dark, depressing, smelly, loud Carpet dirty and old Floors stained  Towels thin scratchy and stained Tub huge brown stain hairs in tub, mildew and mold in tub sink, old, clogged, dirty water came up from pipes Air conditioner, loud and blew air on us, not able to sleep But who are we kidding, I stayed up most of the night afraid to touch anything Fridge - dirty, freezer was so covered in ice, (never been defrosted) Front desk person said the property was renovated 2 years ago, more like 20 and I'm not exagerrating. The whole place
Manager Response: Dear Yvette, We are very sorry to read your review of our hotel. This is not the type of experience that we want for our guests, and we sincerely apologize for any failure in delivering on our commitment to provide you with a clean, comfortable, and pleasant place to stay. While it is somewhat discouraging, feedback such as yours is helpful as it enables us to improve upon our product and service. We have noted your concerns, and rest assured that we will work hard to address them. We hope you will give us another chance down the road as we are eager to make this right!  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary Heading: Avoid this place at all cost!!!!
Summary: 1st things 1st, while we were checking in, a guest came storming to front desk complaining about he paid $300 for a room that was right on the freeway and the toilet didn't flush. The pool is closed. When we asked why, they stated the health department closed it down. They only supply 1 ply toilet paper. Seriously, you can see through it. It's as thin as tissue paper and as soft as a toilet seat cover. They gave us 1 bath towel, 2 floor towels and 2 hand towels. No wash cloths for 4 people. There were not enough outlets to charge devices. Luckily I brought a multi plug outlet/USB surge protector. Dirty bed linens, sink didn't drain. Not a "hot" breakfast just packaged pastries and coffee. Smells like urine outside. The whole place is extremely sketchy! Two of the main amenities

I was okay if they don’t have any to serve but advertising such a thing is misleading! I was rushing when I book three days and did not read the feedback about this location! Lesson learned.

Summary Heading: No breakfast and dirty, this should used only as a LAST RESORT ONLY
Summary: This did not uphold the La Quinta standard at all.  There was no hot breakfast or breakfast of any kind. I woke up at 6am and there were only a single row of dollar store snack cakes one pot of coffee and no fruit no toast no waffle maker and the juice machine was out of juice, but I saw a worker drinking from it during my check in the day before so that’s where it’s going. Even for a take and go it was pathetic.  My a/c in my room did not work, it actually made the room hotter and more humid than it was outside.  Wouldn’t change my room, I had to buy a fan.  The room was filthy, I spilled a little water and cleaned it up with one of the “towels” and the towel turned black from the dirt that was on the floor.  The staff is rude and doesn’t even try to pretend to be welcoming.

Toilet had blood smears on it and the bathtub was clogged and filthy. I will never stay here again. The room was hot when I arrived. Only medium size towels. It smelled and just looked dirty. The pillows had stains and looked dirty. All pillows were worn down and looked 10 years old.

Summary: La Quinta is a good hotel. The rooms are always clean, and checking in and out is never a problem. The hotel staff is friendly, and helpful. The location of the hotel is also a plus. I would recommend this hotel.

If I could give zero stars I would. The front desk agent named Stan was so rude. He was awful. Not helpful at all, made me loose my reservation which was already paid for. The hotel was dirty. Smelled bad. Questionable people hanging out in the parking lot. Not safe for families. I ended up staying at La Quinta inn & Suites in Santa Ana and it was a night and day difference, I actually was treated like a person. The place was so clean and employees were very courteous. It’s only about 13 minutes away but it’s worth it. Don’t stay at La Quinta inn in Costa Mesa. You will definitely regret it.

I like budget friendly lodging but this hotel is gross.  I was not willing to spend the night and had to go elsewhere.  Comparable to what I would expect for $60/night.  Don’t let the La Quinta name fool

Floors dirty; one ply toilet paper;cheap thin towels; half of lights didn't work. Staff need to pay more attention to cleaning of room's move things around to make sure things are good to go for next customer

DO NOT STAY HERE! Oh my goodness, TERRIBLE! Ask for a room close to the pool, they neglected to tell me the pool is closed! Inquired about another amenity of breakfast, no breakfast being served. Waited 1.5 hours to get an extra towel. EXTREMELY NOISY, right off the freeway. Staff is rude when inquired about lack of amenities and told me to complain to Wyndham Customer Service. The pictures are extremely deceiving and the facility doesn’t look anywhere near as nice as the photo shopped pictures posted.

Summary Heading: Like a hotel from a horror movie!
Summary: Filthy rooms, drug sellers/users hookers, pimps. No towels, clean bedding. The staff is rude and indifferent. Long waits for check-in/check-out. If on the fwy side it is so loud the windows rattled all night. No breakfast, no coffee, no clean sheets. Bugs, cobwebs it was so gross.

we expected more for the price, location not being a factor at all, it was right next to the freeway and incredibly noisy. it definitely needs updating, room looked really old bath linens were terribly thin and rough

Summary Heading: WORST hotel I have ever checked into.
Summary: I checked into this hotel and when we arrived in the room the comforter had blood stains and cigarette burn holes. The non smoking room smelled like cigarettes. The shower was filthy and had hair on the walls still. We tried to rinse out the shower and washed our hands after touching the disgusting comforter with blood. The hotel manager named Sam was extremely rude and said “too bad the room was used” I want a refund. I have never been in a place so disgusting and dealt with someone so unprofessional.

Summary Heading: The worst hotel I have ever stayed in.
Summary: I don't consider myself a picky person. I've stayed in hostels and old road-side motels. I've stayed in places others would turn their noses up to.  Yet, I would NEVER stay at this place again. The carpets were disgusting, there was a lot of hair left in the tub, the bed covers were stained with dirt and blood. Had it not been so late, we would have found another place to stay.

Absolutely the worst hotel room I have ever stayed in. I wish I could say something nice but there just isn't anything nice I can say. The rooms are so worn and dated as were the towels and the rooms all had a smoke smell in them . All I would say is :STAY AWAY!!!

I wouldn't recommend this hotel. The hotel is not maintained and our room was very, very dirty.  It sits on the 405 freeway and if you are unlucky to get a room on that side, you will hear the freeway all night.  I don't like being negative like this, but there is nothing I can say that was positive.  The manager never contacted us regarding our concerns.

Summary Heading: Worst hotel I've ever stayed at.
Summary: The rooms are dirty. Carpets stained through out rooms and halls.  The rooms smell bad.  The TP is half ply.  Your room will not get room service.  The staff's excuse is you have to be present to get you room cleaned.  You have to ask for clean towels.  The dirty ones are not collected.  The ac doesn't work right.  No breakfast.  No pool.  I was desperate for an available hotel that was the only reason I stayed there.  Never again.  La Quinta and Wyndham should be ashamed to have their name on the building.

Gross.  The check in process was slow. They employees aren't wearing masks or enforcing their very large signs on the door that say masks required. Our rooms were disgusting and dirty. We spent over 700 for 2 days and not once did housekeeping come. The front desks excuse was "it was cleaned before you checked in". One towel was provided in the room. We're a family of 6 between 2 bedrooms, that doesn't work. My daughter went to get towels at the front desk because they don't deliver to the room. She got a rude eye roll and handed 3 towels.  They push "non smoking", people are smoking everywhere.  "Security" at night was a dude sitting in the back parking lot, in his car, asleep.  Rooms were not cleaned properly. Doors were FILTHY! Towels are scratchy, shower has mold, there were

Summary Heading: diry,bad staff, pictures lie, not worth one penny
Summary: we where charged for queen but got full beds, breakfast was included but they cancelled it, pool was closed, wouldnt give us distcount, fridge leaked all over our stuff and they would only give us two towels. wouldnt fix it, bathroom kept clogging because of all the hair!!! very dirty only one plug worked...staff rude, very disrespectful, place was extremely dirty. we had no where else to go!!! there pictures on website are a lie!!!

The location is absolutely filthy. They will overcharge CC without consent. You can provide feedback and they do not care nor will they provide resolution. They will charge you for a more expensive room and provide a lesser room. The staff I encountered used racist remarks upon my expressing my dissatisfaction that was causing my immediate check out upon inspecting the room. I was over charged one TWO different credit cards. Inspite of not spending the night I was still charged for the day I checked in... this location should be condemned.

I wish I could give this hotel zero starts!! The room and property are filthy!! Looks like it hasn’t been cleaned in years. Unfortunately my husband and I had to stay one night because there were no available hotels. We couldn’t sleep from how filthy and smelly the room was. We couldn’t wait to check out. Don’t even think about staying here.

I would give it 0 stars if I could. This was BY FAR the worst hotel experience I have ever had. The front desk staff was rude. We made the reservations for 4 people and they gave us one towel and expected us to share. When I went to ask for other towels, after repeatedly saying we were not going to share 1 towel they gave us 3 more towels that were stained. The bathtub was disgusting, the sheets were stained as well. The curtains had holes in them. It was the worst experience staff-wise and hotel wise I have ever experienced. Do not stay here.

Don’t think about staying in this place. It’s disgusting, dirty, no toilet paper, the shower is filthy!!!!  This hotel is very old, run down. Needs a facelift. If you decide to stay here bring your own Clorox and gloves to sanitize the room.

Summary Heading: La Quinta Inn by Wyndham Costa Mesa Orange County
Summary: Dirty, nasty, place. Next to the freeway so traffic noise all night long. Moldy shower, nasty mattress, dirty floors. Really a nasty place. I do not recommend. I cancelled a two week stay after one night.

Room was filthy. Huge hair left in fridge. Stains all over the carpet. Bathtub was stained in multiple places. Bathroom and sink area looked like the floor hasn't been cleaned in months. Property did not feel safe at all.

The place is gross. Dog poop everywhere outside, homeless people going through the trashcans outside the rooms, the room wasn't even clean after checking in. The pillowcases were dirty, the washcloths had someone else's lipstick on it, and the toilet had brown stains on it.  Go elsewhere, you get what you pay for. Lesson learned 100%

First and last time here, place is dirty! Customer service is really bad! Our phone in the room did not work and found out that some rooms don't even have phones. No room service available. Place is run downed.

Summary Heading: Demand a partial refund, as this place is terrible
Summary: Need a partial refund, at least.  Misled by hotel and travel sites.  They apparently stopped serving breakfast over a year ago.  So please remove breakfast from the description that is tantamount to false advertsing (we have kids and booked two rooms separately, so breakfast is important).  Lights burnt out in room, clearly for some time given condition of bulb.  Housekeeping did not correct, so how clean can this place be?  Pool has nasty floating debris and film on water.  While guests need to go into pool when clean, and not use pool as toilet or tub, can't the hotel clean the pool once in while?  Again, would have been nice with kids. . . .  Try to find an electrical outlet (socket) in the room, let alone one that works -- I dare you.  C'mon, try.  Bet you can't find one.

Summary: Well first I had reservations for 2 double beds in a non smoking room. When I arrived to the hotel at 5 pm I was told my room was not available. I was asked to wait for 20 minutes in the lobby while I watched them tend to all the other guest and give them the room they reserved. I started to file a complaint with Booking.com about my reservation and the hotel service when the employee called me to the counter. He stated my room was now available. He put my family and I in a smoking room that looked like it wasn’t even cleaned at all. I wanted to leave the hotel but was told I would be charged the full amount. I couldn’t breath in the room it was so stuffy and smelled strong of cigarette smoke. There was a large stain on the carpet which looked like it could of been blood. The
Manager Response: Dear guest, We are very disappointed to read your review of our hotel. It certainly does not sound as if you had the experience that we strive to provide for our guests, and we sincerely apologize for any failure in delivering on our commitment to provide you with a clean, comfortable, and pleasant place to stay. We are sorry to hear that your room was not ready upon arrival, and we deeply regret the issues you describe with cleanliness and the smell of smoke. We are a smoke-free property, but, unfortunately, not all of our guests abide by our rule, and occasionally, as seems to have happened on this occasion, a guest will smoke in a non-smoking room. We thank you for voicing your concerns to us, and we will conduct an investigation within our housekeeping department to correct any lapses in current cleaning standards. We will also ensure that our staff does a better job of airing out the rooms moving forward and see to it that our front desk staff provides better customer service in the future. Thank you for considering our hotel for your stay in Costa Mesa and for taking the time to post your review. We appreciate both.  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary: I had a bit of a personal problem on this trip but luckily it was all taken care of. My advice to anybody staying at this hotel is don't speak to the staff that is working outside or cleaning the rooms in anything but a positive tone or manner even if it's taken forever for them to get to your issue. The other thing is the Costa Mesa police department had been there 3 weeks before this day that I had and there is a cross with a memorial that is present on the other side of the parking structure which kind of freaked me out but I think they should maybe not have that there it's just kind of creepy. However when I did get back to the property to reclaim my items the staff was good. At least I got my items back however do not speak to the cleaning staff or gardeners in any tone
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for the positive rating. Your comfort and satisfaction are of the utmost importance to us, and we truly value your feedback. By telling us what you liked about your stay and how we can improve, you are helping us deliver a superior experience for you and other guests in the future. We appreciate you taking the time to let us know how you perceived our accommodation and service, and we will review your comments in detail and make changes wherever possible in improving our property and training our staff to ensure a superior experience for future guests. We hope to earn your business on future travels so that we can delight you with our continuous improvement.  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary: Shabby and unwelcoming but also outdated and dirty. The checkin process was the worst I have ever experienced and will not be back again or will not recommend either. The beat part was check out and the smart tv was cool and oh pet friendly too.
Manager Response: Dear guest, We are very sorry to hear that you did not have a wonderful stay with us. We apologize for the aspects of your visit that did not impress you, and we regret any failure in delivering on our commitment to provide you with a clean, comfortable, and pleasant place to stay. We take guest feedback very seriously, and we will conduct an investigation within our housekeeping and maintenance departments to correct any lapses in current cleaning and upkeep standards. We will also endeavor to find out what specifically arose at check-in and see to it that it doesn't happen again. Thank you for considering our hotel for your stay in Costa Mesa and for taking the time to post your review. We regret that our accommodation was not suitable for your needs, but we appreciate you staying with us on this visit.  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary Heading: Worst motel I've ever stayed at.
Summary: Dreary,, filthy room.  Stained carpets.  Substandard cable channels.  I paid for a "deluxe" room and got a standard.  I had to call the front desk to have the matter straightened out.  Mediocre cable tv channels.  Lack of amenities in the bathroom.  Room didn't even have kleenex.
Manager Response: Dear guest, We are very sorry to hear that you were so disappointed with your stay at our hotel. Our aim is to provide a clean, comfortable and pleasant place to stay, and we sincerely apologize that our hospitality and attention to detail left something to be desired in this case - this is very unlike us. We take guest feedback very seriously, and we will put all your comments to good use for the betterment of the guest experience. We will also conduct an investigation within our housekeeping department to correct any lapses in current cleaning standards. Thank you for considering our property for your stay in Costa Mesa and for taking the time to post your review. We regret that our accommodation was not suitable for your needs, but we appreciate you staying with us on this visit.  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary: One of the dirtiest and smelliest rooms I’ve ever been in. The noise from the freeway is very loud. The door to the room does not have a full seal on it. You will hear the noise all day and night. The price was the only thing I was satisfied with.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for choosing to stay with us and letting us know that our price suited you. We appreciate it. We strive to deliver a great guest experience, but it sounds like we did not achieve our goal on this occasion. We apologize for the issues you experienced with the room, and we regret the inconvenience you describe with street noise. We take guest feedback very seriously, and we will conduct an investigation within our housekeeping department to correct any lapses in current cleaning standards. Furthermore, we will alert our maintenance team to your comments so that they can take immediate action to address the issue that you have highlighted with the door. Also, while we don't have much control over external noise, we can probably look at assigning a quieter room for you the next time, should you consider staying with us again. It is disappointing if a guest leaves with less than first-rate experience - this is very unlike us. We hope for a chance to redeem ourselves with you and restore your faith in our hotel and hospitality.  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary: Upon checking in we walked up to our room and opened the door. Before we even walked in the room we noticed the room was not clean, had a tote of electronics and bags of trash. On the dresser there was drug paraphernalia and it smelled awful. Needless to say we closed the door and checked out immediately. I can’t imagine what the rest of the room looked like because that is just what we saw standing outside the door looking in.
Manager Response: Hi Marilyn, We are very sorry to read your review of our property. Our housekeeping staff cleans, sanitizes, and inspects each room so that it is ready for incoming guests. A room with odors and in the condition that you are describing would not/should not have passed inspection. We appreciate you bringing this to our attention, and we will conduct an investigation within our housekeeping department to correct any lapses in current cleaning standards. Thank you for considering our accommodation for your stay in Costa Mesa and for taking the time to share your feedback. We appreciate both. We would love the opportunity to redeem ourselves with you, should you choose to revisit us.  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary: We have never stayed at a La Quinta or Wyndham property that was as run down with dirty rooms until this experience.  Pet stained carpets, brown stains on bedding and dirty counter tops.  Changed rooms and the second was only marginally better.  Loud noisy environment all night
Manager Response: Dear guest, We are very sorry to hear that you were so disappointed with your stay at our hotel. It certainly does not sound as if you had the experience that we strive to provide for our guests, and we sincerely apologize for any failure in delivering on our commitment to provide you with a clean, comfortable, and pleasant place to stay. We take guest feedback very seriously, and we will conduct an investigation within our housekeeping department to correct any lapses in current cleaning standards. Furthermore, we will continue to do our best in informing our guests to observe silence, especially during quiet hours, to ensure a comfortable stay for all of our guests. Thank you for considering our accommodation for your stay in Costa Mesa and for taking the time to post your review. We appreciate both. We would love the opportunity to redeem ourselves with you, should you choose to stay with us again.  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary: The beds are very nice and the staff was very helpful and nice too! I stayed 2 nights and I would recommend this place to anyone wanting to stay in CM or HB. I am traveling with pets and didn't have to pay a pet fee which was great!
Manager Response: Dear guest, We are always pleased to receive feedback from our visitors in relation to their stays with us, and we are delighted with your rating and comments - thank you very much. We are glad to hear that you had a great stay with us, and it's nice to read that you liked the beds and found our staff helpful. We are also happy to know that our policy of welcoming pets at no additional charge suited you. Please do let us know if there is anything that we can do to make the next experience even more enjoyable for you. We appreciate you recommending our property to prospective guests, and we look forward to having you back soon for another pleasant stay during your next trip to the area.  Best Regards, Guest Experience Team

Summary Heading: Dog friendly is worse than a pound
Summary: Our dog friendly room was heavily soiled with dog feces. I secured another dog friendly room at a nearby hotel which was very nice then we checked out at La Quinta. They did not offer to refund my deposit. They did offer a different room but by then I just wanted to get out.

Had a wonderful stay and the staff was very helpful. My family and I will definitely will be back! The property was very bright and I can see the ocean from the third floor.  My dog enjoyed the pet area as well.  Thank you

I just want to say thank you to the front desk worker named Luci. He worked with me bc I was struggling to pay the full deposit fee after I was told the total amount for my room. He was very understanding and stayed completely professional about my situation the entire time. I really appreciate him and everyone else that works there. Thank you again and I'll be back soon!

Summary Heading: Awesome Spot!! Will come back again
Summary: Great room with pool view, microwave/fridge. And walking distance to Hooters.. Sanjay was very hospitable and gave us directions to local eatery around town.. The beach is minutes away too from the hotel.

Summary Heading: La Quinta off the 405 in Costa Mesa
Summary: I stay at this location quite frequently. The staff at the front desk are very friendly, Ken is often the one who checks me in and he is very accommodating. There have been plenty of times I called the front desk needing amenities that I had run out of and I took note of how quick they were to get my towels, sheets, etc to my room. I would recommend staying here, it's clean, there isn't riff raff hanging around outside which makes for a quiet atmosphere which I love!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking time tell us about your experience. We are happy to hear about your experience. We would like to share your experience to our team members to achieve success.   We are hopping to serve you better and better again.   Best Regards Ken

Summary: Hotel is very clean.housekeeping helped me extra towels. Ken helped me accommodate with Accessible room. My wife and I liked this hotel. We will recommend this to our family members and friends. We will visit this place again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking to tell us about your experience. We are happy to hear about your experience.  We are glad that our team member helped with accessible room.   We are looking forward to serve you better in future.   Best Regards Dan

Summary: We went to New Year’s Eve and I must say everything was excellent.  The front lobby was well decorated. Very clean spacious and hygienic room. Beds were very comfortable. Also Very Grateful to Mr. Ken, who helped us upgrading our room into deluxe which was facing the pool area.   I will definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at La Quinta Inn by Wyndham Costa Mesa Orange County. It is always a pleasure to receive positive feedback.  I am particularly pleased that you found our service good. I will share your comments with our team, who I am certain will be encouraged by your remarks. Here at La Quinta Inns & Suites, we continuously strive to exceed your expectations.  Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we look forward to serving you in the future.  Sincerely, Ken

Summary: This is the second time in few years and this place is improved a lot compared to last time. New paint looks attractive. Stan the supervisor is very helpful. He helped me find a parking spot and help me with pool facing room. Mew rooms are nice and clean. Will recommend to this place to mu family and friends.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience. we are happy to hear that you liked the changes in our hotel. I am pleased to know that you are happy with our Team members and we will share this experience with our team members to achieve the best customer service experience.  Here at La Quinta Inns & Suites, we continuously strive to exceed your expectations.  Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we look forward to serving you in the future.  Sincerely,

Summary: Lucifer Morningstar you are the best person I met so far! You took good care of me and my family would be looking forward to stay with you again! The property was clean and they have 24 hrs security that makes this place so safe! I can sleep without any worries
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking time to tell us about your experience . We are happy to hear that you are happy with our service and our team member are very helpful.  Your feedback is important to us and we will share your experience to our team member.  we are happy to assist you in future. Thank you for  staying at La Quinta Inn costs mesa.   Sincerely,

Summary Heading: This hotel has went down hill.
Summary: I have stayed here many times over the last 10 years. For the price it was decent. But this last time was horrible. The room had no heat the first night. The carpet was filthy. They put us in another room and told me they would discount the room. When I checked out there was no discount. Very disappointed in our stay. They don't keep it clean like they used to.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,    Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at La Quinta Inn by Wyndham Costa Mesa Orange County. I am sorry that your experience did not meet your expectations; please allow me to express my sincerest apologies. we are sorry that you had to face the problem with heat in the first night and carpet was filthy . We are working on improving carpets. Here at La Quinta Inns & Suites, we continuously strive to meet your needs and expectations.  Sincerely,

Summary: DO NOT STAY HERE I made an acc JUST to write this . Had family stay in 2 separate rooms & I had to BEG to have the room cleaned . (Room 201 & Room 215 for 3 nights ending Jan.1st) Room service NEVER comes to clean . I called front desk around 1:30PM to have the housekeeper clean the rooms . The man at front desk , a tall south Asian man with glasses and dark hair , said he will send someone . We were gone a few hours returning around 4:30 . Rooms still weren't cleaned . We had trash overflowing and needed service so I went to the front desk personally to ask for cleaning . The same man was there and he said yet again he'll send someone . He didn't ask for my room # so I went out my way to tell him . How was he going to tell the housekeeper I wanted service if he didn't even ask
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at La Quinta Inn by Wyndham Costa Mesa Orange County. I am sorry that your experience did not meet your expectations; please allow me to express my sincerest apologies. we continuously strive to meet your needs and expectations. it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future. Sincerely,

Summary: The first few times I stayed there, it was very nice. Clean, freshly painted and good service. It was recently purchased and it started to get run down. Carpets stained, bedding soiled, inattentive reception staff. I had a talk with them and they told me people just trash the rooms something awful and I can understand that but still, I have sent people there and they ran when they saw it. Really too bad. Was a great motel and they ran it down. There is no inspection or control. I had to buy odor powder and sprinkle it on the carpet, then borrow the maids vacuum to vacuum it up. Odor was awful. Never should have given someone that room.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at La Quinta Inn by Wyndham Costa Mesa Orange County. I am sorry that your experience did not meet your expectations; please allow me to express my sincerest apologies. we continuously strive to meet your needs and expectations. it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.   Sincerely,

Summary: Didn't get what I paid for.  Rented a suite because we were there for two days.  It was a garbage pit.  The room was filthy with food on the floor and grime on lights and counters.  9+" hair clog in bathtub had to be pulled to let the bathtub drain.  Management was apathetic. Assistant Manager  agreed to clean the room when I complained, but they did not.  Tried to use the excuse that due to COVID 19, they couldn't clean a room when it was occupied.  They appear to be renting rooms to transients who throw clothes and garbage in the common area.  Second worst hotel on the trip.  Reno was much worse.  Wouldn't recommend staying at La Quinta in Reno or in Costa Mesa.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at La Quinta Inn by Wyndham Costa Mesa Orange County. I am sorry that your experience did not meet your expectations; please allow me to express my sincerest apologies. Here at La Quinta Inns & Suites, we continuously strive to meet your needs and expectations.  We appreciate the time you took to share your concerns, and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Summary: Our stay was not a what we expected. It was not very relaxing or what i would believe to be a wonderful place to stay. Upon check in there was lots of cops checking a customers vehicle. There was alot of people outside throughout the night hanging out near their vehicles being very loud and smoking. Our shower ceiling was leaking and i did let the front desk know and both issues upon my check out. The carpet was also very disgusting. You could not walk around in your socks without them getting dirty. And lastly, when i checked out my deposit was post to be released. The gentlemen charged it. And i called Friday and he said no it was released. Then said I'm sorry. I don't want to lie to you. I just refunded it. I'm still waiting for my refund. One of the worst Wyndham has on

We appreciate the time you took to share your concerns, and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely, Ken

Summary: I wish they actually served breakfast as advertised! I booked this hotel for that specific feature, as I was staying for a week. That is false advertising 🙄 .  If you can serve coffee, you can serve food. In addition to that,, there is construction going on the freeway, which the hotel is right next to! The construction crew woke me up early and kept me awake. Very disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at La Quinta Inn by Wyndham Costa Mesa Orange County. Summary: Dirty, noisy with all the roadworks being done 24/7.  Right next to the 5 freeway.   If that was not bad enough increasing the price during a wildfire by 120% is very very poor.  Other hotels are giving discounts helping people yet you just use it as an opportunity to price gouge people.    I wouldn’t stay here ever again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at La Quinta Inn by Wyndham Costa Mesa Orange County. Summary: I stayed here recently and my stay was great. I spoke to Sanjay and he was very helpful. The other staff were very friendly and welcoming. the rooms were nice and were clean. i would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for staying at La Quinta Inn costa mesa. Your feedback is valuable to us. It is always a pleasure to receive positive  feedback. We continuously strive to exceed your expectations.   Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we look forward to serving you in the future.

Summary Heading: CARPET WAS FILTHY DIRTY - GOT BED BUG BITES -
Summary: The Carpet was just Filthy Dirty.  There was a lot of noise all night, People coming and going, was woken up all night.  The Toilet was making a constant noise all night.  I came home and had Bed Bug Bites, on my Face, Arms, Hands, and Back.  It has been awful, had to get Medical Treatment.  I would never stay here again.

Here at La Quinta Inns & Suites, we continuously strive to meet your needs and expectations.   Thanks

Summary: make sure you bring flip flops to wear in room.  Floors are disgusting. They shouldn't be operating with the stickiness and filth of the carpets.  I was grossed out, when my barefoot touched the floor.  Immediately washed my feet.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at La Quinta Inn by Wyndham Costa Mesa Orange County. Summary: slept right next to the freeway. made reservation a week ahead. called to tell them late arrival. disgusting dirty. long black hair on the hair dryer. dirty bathroom, lobby, lamps, no covid precautions
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at La Quinta Inn by Wyndham Costa Mesa Orange County. Here at La Quinta Inns & Suites, we continuously strive to meet your needs and expectations.

Summary: got into the room and immediately had a terrible smell, we could tell that the carpet has had water damage or the carpets were washed and not dried properly. the carpet was still damp. the bath towels were not exchanged after the first night and were questioning the need for new towels the next day. the property was dog friendly which was the only upside, it does appear that this hotel is a work in progress as employees were working on picking up around the property.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at La Quinta Inn by Wyndham Costa Mesa Orange County. I am sorry that your experience did not meet your expectations; please allow me to express my sincerest apologies.  Your feedback is very important to us, and I am saddened to hear that we did not meet your expectations . We are working on to improve carpet and hoping to resolve this issue.   We appreciate the time you took to share your concerns, and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely, Ken

Summary: I got caught with out a place to live and ended up here till Covid is over the staff is ridged and that can get in the way of service its a good location and the room is clean and nice. Shopping Beach and things to do are all close by its location is right off the FWY with easy access staff is new and dont have it down I dont think their highest priority is customer service.

Place looks like dump. The room smells terrible and carpet is so dirty.  The first Time we use the key it wasn’t working and had to go back to front desk to reset it.  They do not offer grab and go breakfast like other LQ places. I asked for coffee maker and they said because Of COVID they don’t offer it. I don’t understand why other LQ properties do offer them. I asked for shower cap and they said they don’t have it.  When I needed to call front desk the telephone in the room is not working.  The light bulb on one of the lampshades was broken too. And the air condition is so loud.  I’m glad I only stayed one night. I don’t think I can handle stating long.  They also do not have hand sanitizer at the front desk. Will never go back.

Read the (recent) reviews before your stay. Unfortunately, my experience was terrible. The staff does not value their job and aren’t taking precautions to stop the spread of Covid-19. I will never spend another dime with Wyndham.  Upon checking in the facility was dirty. When I checked into the room the bathtub was disgusting. There was hair, dirt and blood in the tub. I’ve never experienced anything like that. I asked for a refund and was denied. I offered to stay at a different Wyndham hotel upon approval of a refund and was denied. There is no customer service and no pride in their work.

This location has excellent customer service . The receptionist was friendly and knowledgeable . She made my check in swiftly,  quickly.  This was one of the best Wyndham locations I've stayed in. I would definitely recommend this hotel to my family and friends

Would come back here anytime. They treat me like I am part of the family. The breakfast makes my mornings great. What more can I say. Fluffy soft lining, everything very clean. They respect my privacy!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking time to tell us about your experience.  We are happy to hear that your liked our hotel and our service. We are looking forward to serve you better in future.   Thank you,  Ken

Summary Heading: Short stay while waiting for house to be ready
Summary: Most of the front desk personnel were friendly and upbeat. I locked myself out of my room twice and they were more than accommodating, providing a spare key. Robert was awesome and there was a young Hispanic woman at the front desk who was very personable. Breakfast was exactly what I envisioned, thank you.  The highlight of my stay was housekeeping. That team ROCKS! They were cheerful and always happy to provide extra linens or coffee. Thank you again for a peaceful stay.

Older Hotel, but a pleasant stay for a good price.  We had 8 rooms for our group, all were nice and clean.  The Hotel needs some upgrading, but the rooms were not in bad shape or need of repair, just a bit dated.  The breakfast offered was the new standard make you own waffles, hard boiled eggs, cereal, fruit (apples and bananas), yogurt, bread, toast, and pastries.   Breakfast is earlier on weekdays than on weekends.  The pool was used by our party, but was not warm.  You have to beware that the 405 Freeway runs right along the front of the Hotel, and being a business, there is no sound wall between them.  None of our party complained about the traffic noise inside the rooms, but it was evident outside, especially on the second and third floors.  If you are concerned about the

Terrible experience.  If you don't have animals don't stay at La Quinta.  Wyndham has other hotels that are better. This hotel was disgusting.  The smell nearly made me sick.  The highway traffic noise is loud but that made the stay better because it slightly kept my mind off the terrible room smell. No amount of renovations will help this hotel.  I  would start by burning the place down.
Manager Response: We’re very sorry to hear we failed to meet your expectations and were given a room with a pet odor. I reminded our room attendants to report bad odors and other maintenance items so they can be addressed before our rooms get rented. I reported the bad odor and noise level so our maintenance team can check the window and door seals to make sure they are in good condition. Thanks for taking the time to give us a review.

Summary: We had a great stay. There's just one thing that would have made our stay perfect. This property just needs a little updating and a much needed face-lift. I hope that will happen before our next visit.

This property was unsafe, dirty, smelly, and loud. Couldn’t sleep due to the noise from the freeway noise. Got a headache from the smell of smoke from my first room. The staff moved me from my first room to my second room because the first room’s locks were broken. Then they moved me from my second room to my third room because my second room smelled like smoke. I stayed the night in my third room which felt like I was sleeping on the freeway. I woke up feeling tired and groggy for work the next day.   The best part of my experience was checking out of this place, knowing I wouldn’t have to return.
Manager Response: We’re sorry we did not meet your expectations and failed to find you a room that was comfortable and allowed for a good night’s sleep. I shared your comments with our staff and reminded our room attendants to report bad odors and other maintenance items so they can be addressed before our rooms get rented. We will check the door and window seals in the room you were in to ensure they are in good condition to help drown out noise. Thanks for taking the time to give us your feedback.

Summary: Location is terrible. Freeway one side and industrial on the other. We stayed on a Thursday to Friday and had lots of traffic noise. I had family in another room and their toilet malfunctioned. Instead of putting them in another room they sent for repair while still occupying room. Hotel I should say Motel is very old and run down. Unfortunately we didn't pick this place luckily we were only there for one night.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to give us your feedback. We’re sorry to hear you did not like the location of our property and we failed to move your family members to another room. We’ll check the door and window seals in the room you were in to ensure they are in good condition to help drown out noise. Thanks again for your review.

Summary: Booked this hotel for a weekend trip with my fiancé, we were so tired after a long drive. We checked in about 930 and our room smelled of animals horribly! I could not believe how bad it was! We told the concierge we had zero pets!
Manager Response: We’re sorry we failed to meet your expectations. I reminded our room attendants to report bad odors so they can be addressed before our rooms get rented. Thanks for taking the time to give us your feedback.

Summary Heading: You Get What You Pay For
Summary: Spend a little more - Your family will Thank You for it.  Hotel is "Dated" - furniture is from the 19 throw it away.  Housekeeping  needs Quality Control - same hairs on the bathroom floor.  Shower faucet handle kept falling off - called it in, never got fixed.  Not Safe - someone tried getting into our room at 1:45 AM.  On the positive side, Parking is Free - good Luck trying to find a spot.

Really disappointed. The appearance was sketchy at best. The bedding and carpet  is old, maybe from the 90s. The tub was dirty and didnt drain while showering. We paid over $100 a night to stay in a room less quality than a motel 6. Will NEVER stay at a Wyndham property again.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback. We’re very sorry to hear we disappointed you during your stay with us. We do have an older property, so we’ve been updating our guest rooms in-house until we get a renovation. We will make sure the room you were in is next on our list for updating. I spoke to our room attendants and reminded them to use our cleaning process to ensure all parts of their rooms are being cleaned. We’re sorry your tub was dirty and wouldn’t drain properly. Thanks again for taking the time to give us a review.

Summary: The service was very good. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable. The breakfast was nice. There was a decent selection.  The room had very old carpet that hasn't been cleaned in a long time. It smelled like pee. The room is very dark. It was quiet and the bed was comfortable.  Because of the smell I don't think I will stay here again.
