When we asked for a late check out because our flight was leaving for a few hours, we were told 30 minute late check out was allowed. When we asked if we could pay for a late check out so we wouldn’t have to spend hours at the airport, we were told “No, we don’t do that.” When I arrived at desk to check out of the hotel nobody was up front, just a sign saying they would be back soon. 10 minutes later they arrive and I show the lady at the desk the pictures of the bugs in the room and told her how bad the room smelled. Her response was,
Manager Response: Thank your for taking the time to let us know about your stay with us.  My apologies that we did not met your expectations with your room, breakfast selection or staff response.  I will make sure our pest vendor takes care and treats our rooms more often.  They come every month to treat the outside areas and any rooms we think need more attention.  Our breakfast items are as you mentioned; Waffles, Oatmeal, Hard Boiled eggs, cereal, orange juice and apple juice, hot coco, coffee (decaf/reg) muffins, bagels, toast, yogurt, milk, and fruit.  I am sorry that the juice was watery I have mentioned that to my breakfast baristas to make sure they are changing it out when done as they juice concentrate mixes with the water when it comes out of the machine.  I have shared your comments with my front desk team so that we can provide the best customer service to all our guests. I regret that they were not more helpful with your room issues. Please know if told before check out we can do our best to fix the problem and move you to another room.  My apologies again for you not enjoying your stay with us. I know we will do better next time.

Summary Heading: One of the worst stays possible
Summary: Stay at La Quinta's al the time and always have a good experience, BUT, this property is not even worthy of the worst Motel 6. The room smelled musty and the gap under the door was about 1/2" which allowed anything to come in. Killed 2 spiders and more Cockroaches than I could count! The bathroom was "tired" at best and the beds were worn out and sagged in the middle. Do not stay here even if they give you the room for free!
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback. We’re sorry to hear the room you were in had a bad odor and a gap under the door. I reminded our room attendants to report bad odors so they can be addressed before our guests check in. We will replace the door sweep and check the beds to ensure they are in good condition. Thanks again for your review.

Summary: Very comfortable and clean room. Although the hotel is next to the freeway, but no traffic noise. Courteous and caring staff. Nice area and very close to shopping and attraction areas. Breakfast area is just too small, but one can manage.
Manager Response: Thanks for your great review and comments. We’re very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I’m not one to typically post reviews online but this one I could not let go without warning people that they are in danger (LITERALLY). Let’s start with the “minor” problems: 1: cleaning staff hangs out in the stairwells smoking, yes it’s a hotel that still allows smoking, but when your housekeeping is hanging out in the stairwell smoking instead of going to an employee break area or at the very least away from the guest so you don’t look like a motel....where is the professionalism? 2. It’s fine that Marijuana is now legal in California, but (again like the staff in the stairwell) when you allow residents to hang out in one of your parking lots smoking a blunt without a care in the world, again makes your place look like a motel... 3. THIS IS THE BIG ONE....I pull out my
Manager Response: Thank you Daniel for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  We appreciate you letting us know of staff smoking in our exterior stairwells.  We have shared your comment with our staff and have directed them on their breaks to smoke in the designated smoking area on property or away from the hotel.  Yes you are correct we do still have smoking rooms on the property one of the very few hotels in the area.  The rooms are located towards the back and that is also where the designated smoking area is.  Regardless if marijuana is legal or not, we do not condone or allow it to be smoked in our rooms or around the hotel.  We do charge $250 for rooms smoked in and politely request that guests check out when we find they are smoking marijuana.  My apologies if you encountered Guests smoking during your 9 day stay with us. As far as the item you found in your room I can assure you it was not a hypodermic needle.  We did take the item to the local hospital in the area and was told it was not a hypodermic needle. We have spoken to our staff to make sure they are cleaning the rooms properly and have shared your comments with them to make sure items left behind by previous or current guests are found.  Thank you again for sharing with us about your 9 day stay and wish you and your family the best.

Summary: We stayed in La Quinta Inn Costa Mesa for 3 nights during the week of Thanskgiving. The room was excellent clean with new furniture and beside TV, microwave and fridge in the room, there was a small table, which we used for having our dinner. The location is excellent for going to beach,  Disneyland and Pacific Highway (through Harbor Blvd) and also to San Diego (as close to the freeway). Takes about 35-45 min from Airport without traffic. The breakfast is excellent and plenty. The kitchen staffs were very nice make it ready at least 15-30 min before time which is 6 AM. I wish they could add fried potato and sausage like most La Quinta Inn in Texas in their menu. The reception staffs were very helpful and polite.  The price is one of the best in Los Angeles and in fact the
Manager Response: Thanks for the positive feedback! It’s great to know your stay with us at La Quinta Inn Costa Mesa was a good one! We’re looking forward to having you again as our guests!

Summary: This was actually a Rewards stay.  I chose it this time over the nicer La Quinta on Hotel Terrace Way in Santa Ana, because it required significantly fewer points per night.  I'd driven by it probably 1000's of times, but had never stayed here.  First of all, it's an older motel.  That's not necessarily a deal-breaker.  Some of the La Quinta motels are quite nice, and being able to park near your front door can be a time-saver.  The rooms themselves had been updated, so not too bad inside.  My biggest issues were with the parking, the noise level, and with the cramped breakfast area.  The parking lot needs some work, and has an odd layout.  It's really tough to park near your room if you come in past early evening.  The clientele seems to be low-end, and there was a lot of noise
Manager Response: Roy,   Thank you for your candid feedback. We are very sorry to hear that the hotel was not up to par in the areas mentioned.  Please note this information has been passed on to our management staff to ensure improvements are considered and made. We very much appreciated your business and thank you for staying with us.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: I had work in Costa Mesa last week so in order to avoid the monster drive I booked a room at the La Quinta Inn. It was fine. Free parking and free breakfast. The room was fairly clean and the bed comfy. You can't ask for more for $87 a night. The wi-fi didn't really work later in the evening but I could use my phone as a hot spot to watch netflix :)
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive review and the mention of our amenities that you enjoyed.  It was great to hear that you had a good stay.  Traffic could be pretty bad coming out this way especially if you are driving North to get to us.  I am pleased you were able to get a room with us to avoid that awful drive.  Yes our parking is free of charge and plenty of spaces al around the property.  Our Breakfast is also complimentary having: Waffles, Toast, Bagels, Muffins, Oatmeal, Coffee, Milk, Juices, Hot Coco, Eggs, yogurt, cereal and fruit.  We also have pillow top beds and clean our rooms everyday and 2 twice a week for stays longer than 7 nights.  My apologies for the WiFi being slow we will definitely make sure our provider works on that so it does not happen again. Thanks again for staying with us and do hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This was my 2nd stay at a La Quinta. My first was in Independence, Ohio. When I needed a hotel for a wedding I would be attending in Newport Beach, Ca, the first thing I did was find a La Quinta near the wedding venue.  The beds and pillows are so comfortable and I knew that I would get a good nights sleep. I didn't have the opportunity to have breakfast there on this trip, but I did enjoy the breakfast at the La Quinta in Ohio.
Manager Response: Thanks for your great score and comments! We’re very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and were able to get a good night’s sleep! We hope the next time you stay with us; you get to enjoy our breakfast. Thanks again for your great review! We can’t wait to see you again!

Summary: I stayed at this location before never had a problem before . I was laying in bed and some one a total stranger opened my door while I was in bed at 10:30 pm at night . Thank goodness I had the latch on the door only thing that saved me from the person totally walking in on me . I called the front desk immediately to report this issue . I ask did they give out my room key they said no its a bit sketchy someone would have my key and walk right in on me . Front desk send security with new keys, I still couldn't sleep good that night knowing someone opened my door without my consent . I complained the next morning and ask to change rooms .Front desk took 10$ off my next night . But come on that's not worth it I couldn't sleep good the rest of the night and all you did was take 10$
Manager Response: Thanks for your comments regarding your stay. We’re very sorry to hear someone walked into your room while you were sleeping. Would you mind contacting us at lq0541gm@lqreviews.com  so we may discuss with you personally? Thanks again for your comments. We hope to hear from you soon.

Summary: Seemed more of a motel rather than hotel.  Property is older and could use a refresh.  Easy access to the freeway, but also some traffic sounds In the room.  Breakfast was good, standard waffles but nice.  Not a big fan of the coffee but overall breakfast worked for all of us.  Probably try somewhere different next time.
Manager Response: Thanks for your comments regarding your stay. We do have an older property and we are working hard on updating the exterior as well as our guestrooms. We’re sorry the room you were in allowed for the traffic noise to enter. We will check the door seals to ensure they are in good condition. We’re glad you were able to enjoy our breakfast. We are changing our current coffee to a new fresh brew before the end of the year. Thanks again for your review. We hope to see you again!

Summary: I have stayed at this particular La Quinta and I have found the staff to be very professional and always willing to accommodate a request. Good value for the hotel. The breakfast is helpful as well for a cup of coffee and a quick meal to start the day. I would recommend this hotel and it is very close to all freeways
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your stay with us Donna.  It is great to hear that my staff delivered great customer service and were attentive to your needs.  I was pleased to learn that our breakfast was to your liking.  It is always nice to hear positive things that a guest has experienced where we can pass on to our employees when we have out meetings.  Thanks so much for that and we hope you come back soon.

Summary: This hotel is pet friendly with a dog area. The rooms were clean and the beds were very comfortable. Free breakfast in the morning with waffles and coffee and it was located to the freeway with easy access on and off.
Manager Response: It was great to read your positive review for our property.  I am glad that my staff provided great service and the hotel was clean.  Our breakfast has a nice selection: Waffles, Bread, muffins, bagels, cereals, eggs, milk, juice, yogurt, oatmeal, fruit and coffee.  We have a great location near shopping malls, movies theaters, beaches and not to mention the restaurants. It was great that you were able to take advantage and enjoy Orange County.  Thank you again and we hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Can't believe it was a La Quinta
Summary: I don't mind an old hotel but wow this one needs work! Obviously to old to properly clean and the room was infested with gnats. Time for an update or you need to take this name  off of it! Misleading g to people familiar with the chain.

Good size room, clean. Comfortable bed. Helpful friendly staff and service. Decent continental breakfast. Approx 20 minutes from Disney. In reality because of traffic volume it will take at least an hour. If you want a quick cheap meal to tide you over pop to Ikea across the road.  Stayed here 6 days as a Base. Would recommend.
Manager Response: Thank for the positive review bunkerbaby.  It was nice to hear that my staff was helpful and provided great customer service during your stay.  It is as you described although 20 minutes from Disney with traffic it can at times take almost an hour to get there.  But all the while great view and other venues in our area as restaurants, shopping mall, south coast plaza, movie theaters and beaches of course.  I can loose myself in Ikea for hours just walking through the displays for your home.  I have gotten many ideas from them that's for sure. Their cafeteria has nice specials.  Thank you again for sharing with us and letting us know we were here for you during you visit to our area.

Summary: Made a reservation through Expedia.  First time I have done this.  When traveling before I had stayed at  La Quinta and found the rooms clean and updated.  Price was fair. No problems.  I was comfortable when I made my reservation.  BUT, after arriving......I am in my 80th year and I was given a room facing the freeway.  I asked for another room and was given a room and the second floor.  This was ok with me as I considered stair climbing as an exercise. Dirty hand holds and rust.  The steps were poorly marked.  The room was smelling, stains on the bed duster.  Mirrors was old and the backing was coming off.  Towels were good.  Did not have in room coffee.  The painting on the outside of the building was just thrown up no prep  was done .  Did not have breakfast the next morning
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments with us about your stay.  My apologies that you did not enjoy your stay as you usually do.  We are next to the 405 freeway which is a little noisy but the double pained windows do help minimize the noise.  We do have an on going project and taking care of the outside of the hotel painting the walls and rails. We power wash the area that is being done each week.  Then we paint the walls,  ceiling,  doors, rails and stairwells.  It has taken longer to finish the project as we have 3 floors and are an exterior property we do not want to disrupt our guests during their stay.  My apologies for the issues you experienced in your room.  we will make sure we replace the items you mentioned.  we have spoken to your team and shared your comments with them in order to ensure they are reporting items that are in need of replacing or need of fixing.  I wished you would have had breakfast as we do have a nice selection.  We offer Waffles, bagels, toast, orange and apple juice, tea, coffee, hot coco, eggs, milk, yogurt, oatmeal and fruit.  I do hope your long trip back home was a safe and one do hope you decide to stay with us again when in that area and give us another try.

Summary: Had to stay here because work booked it. There are a few things this place needs. Remodel, attention to detail and thicker walls near the 405. This Laquinta is not up to the standards of most I've stayed at. Put some money into it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share with us how we did when you were here with us.  We are right next to the 405 freeway which is great when needing to get to areas not too close but with easy access that helps get you there faster.  The noise is a problem and that will soon get addressed when the freeway expansion begins.  They should be putting up a wall that will help minimize the noise.  In the mean time we are placing door insulations around the frames to help too.  We are looking forward to a renovation ourselves early next year and do hope you will come again to see our new look.  Thank you again.

Summary: I travel a lot for my job, and stay in hotels an average of 2-3 nights a week. What I look for is a friendly staff who makes the end of my day a little more enjoyable. I stay here because Alejandrea, Ashley and Matthew make me feel comfortable and provide that extra touch of kindness that makes me feel welcomed and appreciated. Great staff, Great location, and a place I consider my second home because of them. I can stay anywhere but because of them this is my second home.
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you Louis for your comments and warm affection you have for La Quinta and our staff.  I have shared you review with my team and that just brightened up their day.  It was great to hear that you not only enjoyed your stay but that my team made it even more comfortable for you.  We look forward to your return.  Safe travels.

Summary: This like many of the La Quinta's that I stay when i travel is a good quality accommodation for the cost.  I have used them for many years and always feel that you get more than what you paid for. La Quinta is the first place I look when I need to do a trip or business trip.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments. In sharing your post with my team, your words gave them reason for being a part of our family.  Its guests such as yourself that makes it all worth it.  La Quinta is a great company to work for and have great hotels to stay at.  With the company renovating the Inns and Suites this year makes us Inns have something to look forward to next year.  If you like us now wait until renovations come, you will love it.  Thank you again for being a loyal guest.  We do hope you come again when visiting the area.  See you soon.

Summary Heading: Dirty condom no sympathy or apology from staff and manager
Summary: Found used condom between bed and wall and a condom wrapper in the drawer. Notified hotel staff but got no offer for another room or reinbursement only two hours into stay. Checked out and had no money to stay elsewhere. Following day called to speak to manager who was busy so asst. Manager was reluctant to appologize and made comment that the room had already been used though other guest were willing to tell how we were seen in pool for first two hours but mngr said someone showered and bed had been sat on claiming we were not able to complain about a dirty condom in the room where my two young children were to sleep. 130$ will get u this at la quinta in costa mesa
Manager Response: Dear Tammy,  Thank you for your review of your recent experience at our hotel. We’re so sorry that you encountered less than stellar service during your stay. This is definitely not the kind of experience we want our guests to have. We will make sure your comments are shared with our Management Team, so we can use them for further training purposes.  We do hope you choose us for your future travels.               Respectfully, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Glad to get a room at a reasonable rate at the last minute.
Summary: I was very happy that we could find a room late at night, with the friendly and helpful person at the front desk at 1:30 am. We needed a room that could accommodate 2 dogs, as a fire earlier that evening displaced us. The room was spacious and clean and cozy. The only issue I had was the external noise.. The last time we stayed here, our room faced the 5 freeway, and that noise kept me up at night. So I asked for a room on the other side. However, that wasn't much,if any, quieter.  At around 4:30am it sounded like there were gardeners outside using blowers and weed whackers. So I didn't get much rest, then when I went downstairs for breakfast at 9:10, it was closed and everything had been put away. I don't understand why La Quinta can't have the later breakfast time everyday, or
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  I was pleased to hear that my desk staff was helpful and accommodating to your needs.  1:30am is pretty late and I do hope the fire you experienced was made a little more at ease with my staffs help. I was also happy that the room was clean and spacious for you and your pets. My apologies for the noise you experiences last time with the freeway.  I am glad that we were able to put you in a room that was not by the freeway this time.  I will talk to my landscapers and see if they can start a little later in the morning.  Sorry about the Breakfast being closed when you came done.  The hours are from 6am to 9am on week days and on weekends it is a little later from 7am to 10am.  My apologies for the elevator being down when you stayed with us.  It was in need of a part that they did not have at the warehouse.  It was ordered which took a few days for the repairs to get back up and running.  I do hope it did not cause you too much of an inconvenience.  Thank you again for letting us know what we have done well and what we can improve on.

Summary Heading: Definitely NOT up to the usual standards of La Quinta!
Summary: My wife and I and a friend wanted to stay at a hotel where we have always had great experiences and customer service.  We are used to staying at La Quinta and cancelled our reservation at a different hotel because we wanted to stay at a La Quinta property.  Unfortunately, this particular La Quinta did not deliver!  The room appeared clean, but on our second day my wife moved a chair to use it to blow dry her hair and put on her makeup and underneath the chair we found what appeared to be a piece of raw meat.  We were THOROUGHLY disgusted!  On our way out for the day, we stopped by the lobby and told the front desk clerk what we had found and asked that our room be cleaned and made up.  We were disappointed and angry when we came back to our room to find that, not only was the
Manager Response: Thanks for your comments regarding your stay. We’re sorry about the experiences you’ve mentioned, and your comments are concerning to us. We take service and cleanliness quite seriously, and we’d like to better understand what happened during your stay. Would you mind contacting us at lq0541gm@lqreviews.com so we may discuss with you personally? We appreciate your feedback and hope to hear from you soon!

Summary Heading: Only stay here if you have to......
Summary: I am losing patience with the La Quinta Inns having stayed at four of them now....Each have various degrees of quirkiness, uncleanliness and problems.  I stay at La Quinta not just because of the rate, but because I travel with my dog and they do not require the guest to stay in the room with the dog at all times......almost all others do not allow the animal to be alone.   You pay a big price for this convenience and I don't mean in money, more like aggravation and annoyance.  This "inn" is right next to the freeway.....the pool looks out on the freeway, a very stressful way to enjoy the pool.  When I checked in they were courteous to let me come in 3 hours ahead, but only had a third floor room available, nor was I told it was facing the highway.  I was too anxious to get on
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, it's great to hear you were able to take advantage of our pet policy! To hear were not satisfied with the hotel in general is very disappointing. This is definitely not the kind of experience we want our guests to have.  We will make sure your comments are shared with our Management Team, so we can use them for further training purposes and hotel improvements.  We do hope you choose us for your future travels.       Respectfully,  Lacey

Summary: La Quinta Cosa Mesa is conveniently located on 405 right next to Hooters.  We always book LaQ because of free breakfast and points toward free stays.  Although this is an older hotel, it was very well kept.
Manager Response: Yes we are and have Freeway access!  Thank you for mentioning that.  We are off the 405 Freeway which makes it easy to get to locations that are not too far from us.  Places like the beaches, shopping centers, Disneyland, California Adventure, Knotts Berry Farm, Downtown Disney, etc.  Hooters is great next door but for other restaurants just passed the freeway a many more and if you go down our street just a few blocks you are at the South Coast Plaza Mall and many family restaurant's there too.  I am pleased you look forward to LQ breakfast and points are important.  You can accumulate  points quickly and use them for like you said stays at LQ hotels or even at retail stores and restaurants.  We are an older property and do our best to maintain the rooms and the building.  We will be getting renovated early next year which we are looking forward to so our guests and staff will see new look.  Thank you again for letting us know about your stay and we love the loyalty to our brand.

Summary: This motel is in an industrial area where there are a lot of homeless people. And right next to a freeway with a hooters in the same parking lot. The room I stayed in had blood spatter on the wall and cockroaches in the drawers. I have stayed at other La Quinta property's before and they were awesome. This place is a dump, you couldn't pay me to stay here agian!
Manager Response: Thanks for your comments regarding your stay. We’re sorry about the experiences you’ve mentioned, and your comments are concerning to us. We take service and cleanliness quite seriously, and we’d like to better understand what happened during your stay. Would you mind contacting us at lq0541gm@lqreviews.com so we may discuss with you personally? We appreciate your feedback and hope to hear from you soon!

Summary: Friendly staff, carpet is filthy. The amenities of having a micro-wave and a mini refrigerator, are great, but the extra linens are old, blanket had a hole in the corner, it's a good place to stay on a last minute booking.

Summary Heading: Not up to La Quinta standards
Summary: Perhaps La Quinta purchased this motel/hotel and has not had time to refurbish. It seemed old and unclean, plus there was a spider in the room. Dark and dreary inside of the room. Hoe er, the clerk who. Heckled us in was very nice and efficient.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review. I’m sorry the hotel didn’t meet your expectations. We are currently in the process of painting our entire building as well as updating all the outdated parts in our rooms. We will take a look at our current lighting to see if there is a better/brighter bulb we can use in our guest rooms. I’m sorry to hear there was a spider in your room. Our pest control company treats our property once a month. I will let them know to treat our grounds for spiders the next time they’re out. Thanks again for your review. We hope to see you again!

Summary: Breakfast was serve yourself, they had make your own waffles which was nice! The young man at the desk was really nice and happy when we checked in, and the young lady at was so helpful, I asked for towels and batteries and she responded quickly and asked if she could do anything more for me and I really appreciated that. The front desk staff our really nice and the hotel is welcoming. The only thing I didn't like was the smell of smoke outside the room, but that was temporary from people outside.

I like the beds for my back. The rooms are okay. Staff is nice, I've stayed here before usually last minute after work and the blonde girl is always happy to help me she always smiling. I will be back again when I'm to tired to drive it's a nice place to rest and relax.

Staff was friendly but room reeked of smoke and shower didn't work.Room key did not work in the fitness center and the equipment in the room didn't work either. Internet was very slow and TV remote had dead batteries.

The service was very good. The location was good since I had a car. I was visiting Huntington Beach. The room was nice and clean. But the bathroom area was old, dingy, showing cracks and rust. The breakfast options were nice. The parking was good and the stairways and elevators and ice machines were conveniently located.

This location is run down.  Outside walk ways, paint, and rooms inside reflect much wear and tear.  Soiled carpets, sunken bed, chipped bathroom tile, & dirty doors.  Although non-smoking rooms, we could smell the smoke as we walked by certain rooms.  We also awoke in the middle of the night from incredibly strong second hand smoke seeping from another room into ours.
Manager Response: I am very sorry that there were many smoking issues and odors with your room during your stay with us.  We do have non smoking rooms and do charge a penalty fee of $250 if guests smoke in non smoking rooms.  It is a shame that we still have guests that smoke in those rooms.  We also have designated smoking area as well for those that do not smoke in the rooms.  We are an older property however we are doing our best to get the property repainted.  There are some areas still needing to get done which we will make sure we finish. We are expecting to have a full renovation at the beginning of the year that we are looking forward to.  I do hope you will come back to see our changes soon.  Thank you again for your comments it will help us improve our property.

Summary Heading: Probably would not stay here again
Summary: Family of 4 for Disneyland vacation. Beds hard, pillows lumpy. Floor felt dirty even tho looked clean. Got the room we requested. Staff very nice. Clean pool. Clean grounds. Building looked "older". Breakfast area needs to be bigger to accommodate the number of guests.

Clean rooms, and facility. Very friendly and pleasant staff, nice free breakfast. Good place to walk pets, restaurant sharing parking lot, guest receive discount. 4th time I have stayed here, mostly do to location. Tried another hotel close by, because it was cheaper, and was not happy. Lost my room key, and desk clerk replaced it with out any issues. I attend an annual conference, and will continue to stay here, because of the ease of making the reservation, friendliness of the staff and the comfortable bed, and the price.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure reading your response about your stay and your regular stays with us.  I was most content hearing that my staff continually provides great service with a smile. We are happy that you did return to us even after you decided to stay with another hotel.  That makes it much more satisfying when we hear that we won our guests back.  In sharing your comments with my team I saw their faces brighten which means you made their day and they know they can continue taking care of our guests as they do.  I welcome you back when your travels direct you our way again.  And thank you for sharing with us your stay.  See you soon.

Summary: many complaints. Dirth,mouse droppings, long hair in shower, supplies  short on shampoo, no wake up call as requested and froze my food.  Right next to Hooters.  However, the manager reimbursed me for a day.
Manager Response: Thanks for your comments regarding your stay. We’re sorry about the experiences you’ve mentioned, and your comments are concerning to us. We take service and cleanliness quite seriously, and we’d like to better understand what happened during your stay. Would you mind contacting us at lq0541gm@lqreviews.com so we may discuss with you personally? We appreciate your feedback and hope to hear from you soon!

Summary: This is a very low end La Quinta and quite expensive.  Very bare rooms, no fridge or microwave, very soft beds.  It is also quite loud being right next to the 405.  Shower had good pressure and internet was fast.  Would not stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments. We appreciate you letting us know how your stay was and helping us focus on what we need to do to improve guest satisfaction.  Not all of our rooms come with the microwave and fridge.  Those rooms are limited and do sell out first before the others as well as are at a higher rate. My apologies for the noise from the freeway.  We are right next to the freeway but when the city expand the freeway a higher wall will be put up that will help minimize the noise.  We are also expecting a full renovation next year and do hope you will give us another try.  Thank you again for taking the time to share with us your comments.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay. However, I left my personal pillow behind. We called to say that we would go back and get it. It was either thrown away or stolen. Maybe you can have a lost and found and hold items for 2 days. Also, if breakfast ends at 9 don't put everything away at 8:45.
Manager Response: Thanks Aaron for letting us know that you enjoyed your stay.  It great that our guests take the time to tell us what we did good and also where we can improve.  Thank you for your suggestion for our lost and found.  We will make sure we are holding guests items for those to be returned.  Normally we do keep them for 30 to 60 days depending on the items.  My apologies if your pillow was not recovered.  We will check to see if we still have it.  I was concerned to hear that out breakfast was closed before the scheduled time.  Breakfast hours are weekdays 6am to 9am and on the weekends 7am to 10am.  I have shared your comments with my staff and our breakfast attendants and they will make sure we honor the breakfast hours.  Thank you so much again for taking the time and sharing your comments.  Only through your eyes can we know how we are doing with our guests.  Thank you.

Summary: Worst hotel experience ever. Very disappointed. Furniture was stained. Sofa sleeper was uncomfortable. Bathroom had hair and other debris on floor. Four rooms for my group. Also massive carpet cleaning in the midst of our stay. Poor planning.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know how your stay was with us.  I understand you had a group with us and I am glad that you chose our hotel.  My apologies for the carpet cleaning being during your stay.  We had this scheduled for awhile but 160 rooms is a lot of rooms.  We have been sold our all summer and they were in real need of cleaning.  My apologies if this caused you or your group any inconvenience as we hoped to get them done quickly and efficiently.  I do hope the rooms were nicer once your returned from being out.  We will look into the furniture of your room and make sure they are treated for the stains.  This is not the way we want you to leave feeling about the hotel.  We have shared your comments with our staff and will constantly check the rooms so they are ready for guest arrival. Do hope you will give us another chance when in the area again.  Look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Yes they were cleaning the carpets the day we left.  So should have clean carpets now for everyone who read the other reviews.  The room was nice could use a new shower head though.  Nothing special and Internet speed was OK not super fast.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  You are correct we did clean the carpets in the entire hotel through a professional which was much needed as we have 160 rooms.  Being an exterior property the carpets get dirty faster on the 2st floor than all the others.  We were able to get in the rooms even though the hotel was full with the cooperation with our wonderful guests.  Thank you for letting us know about the shower in the room.  We will make sure that we address that in your room.  Do hope you enjoyed your stay with us and will see you again if your travels brings you our way.

Summary: The woman at the front desk refused to move us to a different room when my guest went back in to complain that the carpets were sopping wet throughout the entire room, and the air was humid and thick with mold/mildew, making it very hard to breathe. This was the absolute worst dive. On our final night, we were finally moved to a different room, but it was too little too late.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  We understand you were unhappy with the cleanliness of your room and have concerns about our housekeeping standards.  We are very sorry for this experience and want to assure you that the Hotel Management Team will be working with our housekeeping staff to prevent any issues in the future.  We hope you will consider staying with us again.    Sincerely,   Danielle

Summary: we were expecting a smoke free room but when we checked in, the whole room, including bed, sheets, pretty much everything in the hotel room smelt like cigarette. we had to buy plug in freshener throughout our stay. bed sheets, and comforters had blood stain and cigarette burns on it. our carpet was so dirty, you would not want to walk around without a slipper. our room that we booked online wasnt the same when we cheked in. also we were told the facility will have a laundrymat on site but that wasnt the case. overall, i would not stay at this location again. i would stay somewhere for the same price next time. the only good part about it was, it was close to the airport where we were flying out of.
Manager Response: Michelle,   We were very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us.  While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, we do extend it with all sincerity. We certainly empathize regarding the points you mention in your review, especially the odor you experienced. We will look into each issue that you have noted in an attempt to correct and improve our hotel.      Sincerely,   Danielle

Summary Heading: Staff is nice but hotel needs updated
Summary: The staff was wonderful and very helpful. The room itself was fine and the beds were comfortable. My only real complaint is that the carpets are gross. They desperately need to be deep cleaned or replaced entirely. They were stained and just very dirty.
Manager Response: Thank you Kayla for letting us know how your stay was with us.  I was pleased to hear that my staff was on top of their game and that you enjoyed the room and the beds.  We do our best to make sure we get the right friendly staff in place.  We have also looked to see which beds are ready to be changed out if they sage or are not comfortable.  My apologies for the carpets.  Being an exterior property and being pet friendly the carpets do get dirty.  We have put in place a carpet cleaning project and will have a professional company come out to clean all the rooms so that we get a jump start on the carpet cleanliness. We are schedule for a full renovation at the beginning of next year so until then we will take care of the carpets.  Thank you again Kayla and I do hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Hotel Stay due to Home Termite Fumigation
Summary: We stayed here because our home was fumigated for termites for 2 nights. Due to the location and cost, it was an excellent choice for the purpose. We had a one bedroom suite and the bed was very comfortable. The fold out couch was not comfortable. Overall good value for the money.
Manager Response: It was great to hear that locals also stay with us here at La Quinta.  Although it was not for vacation it was a little piece of one being away from your home.  I am glad that we could be there for you in your time of need being placed out of your home for a few days.  I was also pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that it was affordable at a reasonable price.  My apologies for the sleeper sofa not being too comfy.  We will look into that and if need to switch it out, will do so.  Thank you for letting me know so I can address the issue.  Look forward to seeing you in the future at our property or one of our sister properties Paul.  And thanks again for the comments.

Summary: This is an older unit that needs to be sold or replaced. It does not meet the standard that I understood to be La Quinta. The breakfast is poorly arranged and congested. We stayed at the one in Redding, CA and were satisfied with the accommodations and service
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback. We’re sorry the hotel did not meet your expectations. We’ll share your comments with our staff so that we may improve our operation and prevent similar situations from happening to other travelers. We appreciate you sharing your feedback with our team.

Summary: The room had a bad odor. It was  not very clean. The light switches were all dirty as was the bathroom counter. They have a crowed breakfast area that is hard to get in and out of without running into others. We didn't use the pool but the water was cloudy.
Manager Response: Thanks for your comments regarding your stay. We’re sorry about the experiences you’ve mentioned. Having a fresh, clean odor free room is important and I’m sorry you did not receive that. I have spoken to our staff to ensure we do not put guests with non-smoking requests in smoking rooms. The pool got a little cloudy due to some tree trimming we had done. It has been addressed and the pool is clear again. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The staff and breakfast was good,but that's about it! I checked in at 10pm after being at the beach all day with 3 kids for my daughters birthday. I got a non smoking room even signed papers for no smoking in the room. As soon as we open the door the smell of smoke was the 1st thing we smelled. They had no other rooms and we had no where else to go being miles from home. I felt horrible having my kids and daughter friend stay in this room that smelled like a group of people had been smoking in there for years. Myself and my two kids having asthma. This was the worst place I had ever stayed and would not recommend it for anyone. I was so excited just for morning to come just to get out of the smell of smoke Asap!!
Manager Response: Thanks for your comments regarding your stay. We’re sorry about the experiences you’ve mentioned, and your comments are concerning to us. Having a fresh, clean odorless room is important and I’m sorry to hear you were given a room that smelled like smoke. Would you mind contacting us at lq0541gm@lqreviews.com so we may discuss with you personally? We appreciate your feedback and hope to hear from you soon!

Summary Heading: Good location & friendly staff, rooms not so much!
Summary: Friendly staff and breakfast (when stocked). Room was not so great. Carpet was stained as well as one of the dresser drawers. Spider greeted me in the bathtub. Other weird looking bugs crawling on walls/ceiling. No microwave, refrigerator, or phone in room. Tv remote provided bit did not turn on/off tv (had to power on/off manually. Would not recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing about your stay Khandi.  My apologies for the issues you had with your room during your stay.  Being an exterior property our first floor rooms do get sprayed monthly by a vendor to keep the insects under control.  We will definitely make sure we check the room and treat them for spiders.  At this property not all our rooms have the micro and frig.  You would have to reserve one that specifies those on the description to make sure you get one. Just a tip those are the first to sell out as we only have a limited amount of those on property so booking early is best.  We look forward to our renovation beginning of next year that will take care of our carpets but in the mean time we are cleaning them on a rotating schedule.  I have sent my Maintenance team to look at the TV and the phone as all should be working properly upon check in. Thank you again so much for letting us know where we did good and where we need to improve.  Hope to see you again.

Summary: Room was clean, quiet at night; bed was comfortable. Breakfast was busy since hotel was full each night but a table was available when families with children were finished by 0830.  No muffins, yogurt or bananas at 0800 - probably all gone but muffins were out again later. Hotel convenient to interstate and John Wayne airport.

Hotel rooms are clean and most things in them function perfectly.  Outside looks dingy and dirty but just needs new paint.  Staff is helpful and friendly.  Good value hotel in this part of the L.A. basin.

Summary Heading: The WORST customer service in town!
Summary: I have stayed at numerous hotels & motels in Orange County during the past decade... Too many to count, and this place by far supercedes any hotel establishment with the worst customer service I have ever seen or cared to experience! It does not matter if you are an Elite member or not, they couldn't give one care! I think inmates in the county jail are treated better than the guests at this particular LaQuinta location. There is some staff that are kind & helpful. One or two girls at the front desk can be pleasant at times & the gentlemen who are in charge of maintenance are wonderful. They are the ones who should be a the front desk greeting guests. If you are unfortunately unlucky enough to be checked in by Alejandra, stop what you're doing & quickly run the other way. I
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know how your stay was.  I must say I was surprised to hear the issues you had during your month long stay with us. This is the first time that we have had such a comment about our staff member.  However I will speak with her and also go further as to retrain her as well as the rest of the staff and monitor the interaction they have with our guests.  I would like to apologize if we made you feel Elite status was obsolete.  For an Elite guest your perks are Free upgrade when available, Express check in, Late check out, bonus points, redeem away, water and snack, mobile check out, dedicated call center, Base points, global hotel access, instant free nights and guaranteed availability.  During your stay, there were many packages that came in for you.  I do believe the packages you are looking for came once you checked out and may have been sent back.  Unless there is a note from a guest stating that you will return to pick up the packages we do not sign for them if the guest is checked out.   Unfortunately we do not have walk in tubs in our handicap rooms.  The handicap rooms do however have the tubs with the bars for hold and support.  Again I thank you for your comments and appreciate you letting us know where we can improve.

Summary: ok for the price. Have stayed at better LQ's.  the one item I did notice was the cleaning staff did not vacum. There was small white piece of lint or paper next to the bed away from the doorwhen we first got to the room and it was still there on the last day.

Problem with magnetic access door key and electrical outlets in room. Older remodeled LaQuinta in fairly good shape. Not much for "free breakfast" late night staff was very helpful to get key problem corrected (3rd try).

I am very happy with the Manager and the rest of the staff. They keep the hotel very clean and are very kind and helpful. In overall I had a pleasant stay. The breakfast was good, they have different options in the food.

The picture of the hotel did not match it, the rooms too. the hotel , rooms, carpet was very dirty. We were promised with two queens in each room 111 and 115 we ended with two small double. we could not sleep all night, we ere three in each room. very dirty outside too. we do not recommend this hotel at all.
Manager Response: We were very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us. While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, we do extend it with all sincerity. To hear you were unable to sleep all night is unacceptable. We continually try to do our very best for all of our guests. Each issue that you have noted will be addressed immediately in an attempt to correct and improve our hotel.   Respectfully,  Lacey

Summary: Original room had not been cleaned and was a mess.  Was upgraded to a suite which was fine but needed to be refurbished.  Bathtub/shower was very slippery and had no grab bars.  Staff was courteous and generally helpful.  This is the second time we have had cleanliness issues at a LA Quinta.  Don't know if we will be back.  Location was right next to freeway.  Don't know if this would bother some people - it didn't bother us.

Summary Heading: I would not stay anywhere else
Summary: The LQ's I stay in are always clean. Your pricing is also fair. My preference' is to stay at the locations that have parking right in front of the room. I attend a trade show every year in Las Vegas. While everyone in my company stay of the strip, I stay at the location near the airport that is close to the strip. I am there for 6 days. They always upgrade me to the suite. I always bring my own food. My cost at the end of is show is 50% lower than the strip

I wanted to share mine and my family’s experience  at the Costa Mesa La Quinta. When we arrived there were homeless people loitering out in front of the hotel and seemed to be very comfortable because none moved when we got out of our cars. The desk clerk was friendly and we checked in. When we got to our room it was clean but the carpet was extremely filthy. My sons room was very dirty and had big dark stains all over the furniture. Yuck. Also it smelled of nasty incenses and the ashes were all over the floor. I reported it to front desk and they acted surprised but did not come up and look. It was a suite. After it triggered an  asthma attack in my son they finally moved him and my parents to another room but only credited my account $40. They only had two double beds
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments about your stay with us at La Quinta.  My apologies for the issues that you encountered during your stay. Being an exterior property and sharing a parking lot with Hooters and the Business Building it is a little difficult to control the non guests from coming into our area.  We do our best to make sure only guests are in the hotel area.  We do have Security on site and Front Desk is on deck 24 hours. The burning of incense is not allowed at the property and I do apologize that the previous guests did not follow our policy.  We are doing better in giving attention to the carpets putting a rotating policy in place so we give all the rooms the attention they need as well as changing out carpets in those rooms that need replacing.  The issue with the other guests that the police were called have been placed on a Do not rent list and will be turned away if ever they try to return again to the property.  We appreciate your comments which helps gives us direction in improving the hotel.

Summary: Don't be fooled by the pictures. The rooms are nothing like what they advertise. There is a oder in the room and their A/C sounds so loud you can not sleep. The price is good compare to other hotel in OC but for sure you get what you pay for. I rather pay more next time than stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for your comments regarding your stay. We’re sorry about the experiences you’ve mentioned. Having a clean, odor free, fresh room is important and I’m sorry to hear you did not receive this at our hotel. The items you’ve mentioned will be addressed before we rent the room to our next guest.  Thanks again for your feedback as it will help us improve our operation.

Summary: The price was right and the staff was lovely but I think that it is time to remodel this location. The rooms look very warn and the air conditioner was not working correctly. Good thing the weather was pretty nice out or else we would have really been suffering. So opening the windows at night did the job.

Summary Heading: Work trip; budget oriented economy hotel. Decent staff and service.
Summary: Have stayed here multiple times before; this is the first time I believe I've ever reviewed it. Co-located in a parking lot with a Hooters; at least you know there's some food nearby if you need it. More than adequate parking, and access to the highway within 2 minutes. However, that's the one disadvantage- property is so close to the highway that tractor trailer trucks is all you'll hear if you're on the side of the building facing it. Hopefully you get a room further away.

Good value and they usually have a vacancy, which is hard to find sometimes. Staff is friendly. Little disappointed with the cleanliness of the room. There was hair in the tub and sink and a coffee stirrer on the floor by the table. The room is kinda small, but most hotel chains are.

Summary Heading: La Quinta Orange County - John Wayne Airport
Summary: Nice hotel.  A little run down.  Needs some TLC and attention to detail.  Freeway was almost in the parking lot.  But, could not hear it in the room.  Fan runs all night, and that is want we want. Hate A/C units that go on and off all night.

I was here for 3 weeks and hardly slept at all.  The noise level is unbelievable!  The front side of the hotel is right on the freeway.  The back is a parking lot shared with Hooters.  I have been coming here for 30 years and it just continues to deteriorate.  The updates through the years have been mostly cosmetic.  The "Brightside" breakfast is a joke!
Manager Response: We were very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us.  While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, we do extend it with all sincerity. We continually try to do our very best for all of our guests. Each issue that you have noted will be addressed immediately in an attempt to correct and improve our hotel.                                                             Respectfully,                                                                                                          LQ Customer Care

Summary: Not a bad trip other than the WiFi my room not working. Was remedied so all good! Location of the hotel was very convenient to my reason for going there and price was ok. Need better lighting all around the hotel.

When I checked into the hotel the AC was running and the room was freezing. I went to the unit to turn it off, but the buttons on the unit were not doing anything. I called the front desk from my cell phone, because the phone in the hotel room wasn't working. The front desk receptionist sent a maintenance man to my room and he explained that there is usually a sign posted on the AC unit directling us to use a thermostat on the wall, but that our room was missing such sign. After he kindly showed us how to use the thermostat he left. I went to use the bathroom and I noticed dried red spots on the inside of the bathroom door frame. My friend who was staying with me commented that it looked like dried blood. It was a small patch and I'm not the type of person to complain unless
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to express your concerns regarding the experience that you encountered during a recent stay at our location. We are very sorry that you had such a negative experience while staying with us. Would you mind contacting the hotel manager at lq0541gm@lqreviews.com to discuss further.                                                                                                                    Thanks, LQ Customer Care

Summary: I like this hotel as its location is near the beaches and shipping, the room is quiet, extremely I like the open style building. It is close to highway, but no noise bothers me at all. I also like the brand name which sounds French to me.

The LQ John Wayne was disappointing. The 405 HWY and Hooters restaurant were sources of endless noise and sleep interruptions. The room itself was worn out and showed signs of heavy use. Breakfast bar was very basic and crowded. Little reason to visit expect for morning coffee. I was very disappointed and rate this as a low end hotel.
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your comments, and we’re sorry we disappointed you during your stay with us. Being able to have a quiet, comfortable room that meets your expectations is important. We are currently working on a solution to better soundproof the doors to prevent freeway noise from entering our rooms. I’m sorry to hear the lobby was crowded and you weren’t able to enjoy breakfast. I will ensure our breakfast attendant is putting enough food out for all of our guests. Thanks again for your review. We hope to see you again.

Summary: The room was comfortable, clean, and perfect for our needs.  Breakfast was a nice added touch.  Parking is limited if returning late, but the location is perfect; close to the beach, Disneyland, and several freeways to get where you want.

We have stayed in this hotel many times for both business and pleasure.  It is close to the beaches (PCH) and Anaheim for the recreation.  it is also close to several clients in Irvine. Very easy access to the 405 both north and south, gas stations and food.  Not far from a Sunday farmers market and strawberry stands.  There is a Hooters next door too.
Manager Response: Thank you Ralph for letting us know how your stay was.  I am pleased to hear that you took advantage of the may venues we have close to our area.  We are bear a few different beaches, shopping malls, restaurants, churches, Airports and Conventions Center. We have many areas that are walking distance as well. Being near the freeways is also a plus so you can get to further attractions very easily.  We do hope your plans include visiting us again and look forward to your return.  See you soon.

Summary Heading: Cancelled our confirmed reservation less than 24 hours in advance
Summary: We had a confirmed booking for a group of 20 rooms, and when we called to verify check in time we were told the booking had been cancelled.  Even though we had email proof that they had received our credit card!  Will never stay at a La Quinta Inn again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and our regrets that your group was not able to stay with us. I understand that you did have a group block with us but the group was cancelled on the cancelation date.  My apologies the information that was sent by your office was not delivered in time from the groups cut off date. These are in place in order to make sure we put back the rooms in our inventory by a certain date if the rooms have not been picked up yet.  To confirm a group we would need both the credit card authorization and a rooming list which at that point the confirmation would have been sent out to your office.  Had we had rooms on those dates we would have been able to reinstate the group however when there are city wide sell outs due to a large convention in the area as there was we were unable to do so. Again my apologies, please feel free to contact me if you would like to further discuss.

Summary: Did not get a good night sleep.  I was very surprised to step when I stepped into the room.  Furniture and carpeting looked old, worn and outdated.  Definitely different experience than other La Quinta hotels
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your comments, and we’re sorry you did not get a good night’s sleep during your stay with us. Being able to have a comfortable room that meets your expectations is important. Thank you for your feedback as it will help us correct these issues with our team.

Summary: This place is so run down and dirty. Look at my pictures. The stairs are so rusted and dangerous! We had to be very careful not to cut ourselves every time we used the stairs because of the sharp pieces of rusted metal sticking out.  Our bathtub had slime around the drain. The pool looked so dirty with this film floating on top. We didn't dare use it. Didn't see anyone use it for 3 days!!! Yuk! I saw the lady who does the breakfast let her friend in the side door. She proceeded to load up her bag with all the fresh fruit and anything else she could get her hands on. Then I knew why there hadn't been much fruit out in the morning. She's letting her friend steal them blind! The ladies at the front desk too zero pride in their appearance as well. None of the tables in the breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you, goodeatstraveler, for taking time out of your day to let us know how your visit with us went. I must say I was disappointed in reading how you encountered many issues during your stay.  However this does help us to focus on guest satisfaction areas and look forward to sharing them with our Team.   The stairs "one stairwell in particular" is being looked at for repairs. Thank you for letting the desk know when you were here.  We have been focusing on cleanliness and working strongly with our new housekeeping staff so they can also clean the room as they should be.  My apologies as we have increased our housekeeping staff and have added many new team members.  I have spoken to our Pool vendors that come and tend to our pool to make sure they are maintaining our pool to standard.  We have sat down with our Breakfast Team Members and shared your comments with them and wanted to thank you for looking out for us. As the new General Manager for the property, I wanted to thank you for you comments.  It really does help in improving the hotel and our staff.

Summary: Much better than I expected.  Quick business trip.  Friendly staff, easy check in process, clean room and bathroom.  Delicious waffle in the morning.  Sweet lady that managed the breakfast area.  I would do it again.

Comfortable, clean, handsome room. Good wifi. The breakfast included was good. Glad to have eggs, bacon and sausage. Good job on the company dinner for 75 people that night. The dinner was well done and warm. The servers were not intrusive during our dinner meeting. Shuttle service to airport was great too and on time.  My bed was comfortable, TV worked fine. Plenty of towels.

Late check-in, motel style inn and the room door was ajar, no lights on in room, no phone in room and staff NEVER brought one, someone used toilet dirty and not flushed, Yolanda the breakfast room attendant absolutely the RUDEST person ever. Yolanda spoke some English but then pretended she didn't know what I said when I told her I was not done eating. So I told YOLANDA in SPANISH and she just said breakfast over and took my food off my table as I was eating!
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know how your stay was when in town.  We would like to apologize for the issues you encountered during your recent stay.  This is not how we want you to think of La Quinta Inn Hotels.  Your comments have been shared with the team so that we can work better on cleanliness and customer service.  Checking room thoroughly for a fresh room and repairing issues we find are our focus.  Breakfast hours are 6AM to 9AM however we do not close the lobby area just the food area.  My apologies if our staff member did not make you feel welcomed.  Please feel free to reach out to me should you want to further discuss your stay.  Thank you again for your comments. I appreciate the information as it helps us focus on the areas we can improve.

Summary: This was an excellent hotel for the price and accommodations were perfect for us. I liked that they also had a continental breakfast as I was in a hurry to get to my destination and did not have time to sit down for a big meal.

We stayed at this hotel for $67 a night between February 7 & 10, 2017.  I was a bit nervous because I had read some good reviews and some horrible ones.  Basically, it is an older hotel near a very busy freeway.  The staff were friendly and helpful.  If asked for something and they got it right away.  Some one was always cleaning the grounds, the deck etc...  We were on the 3rd floor above the pool (very clean) facing the freeway.  I only heard the freeway once when our door was closed.  Our room was older, but clean.  The television could have been updated but we didn't watch it much.  As for Hooters being next door.  It may be noisy in the summer when the windows are open, but in February it was great.  We went their twice with our 16 year old daughter who is vegan.  They went

This is an older hotel that needs some serious updating (stained bedspread, bowling alley carpet, sewer gas smell in bathroom)!  We had someone pounding on our door at 2 am looking for "Bill".  The parking/road was in need of repair also.  We didn't bother with the breakfast - got out of there as as we could!  We will not be going back to that La Quinta.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to let us know how your stay was.  My apologies that we did not deliver great service during your stay.  Rest assured your comments have been shared with our team in order to make sure we address each issue.  We have looked into the condition of our bedding and the carpets and have a project put together to make sure these are maintained.  Unfortunately with the expansion of the 405 freeway our plans to repair the parking lot is put on hold.  Next time you come do stop by the breakfast.  It is a great meal with Waffles, oatmeal, fruit, coffee, milk , cereal, eggs, bagels, muffins and toast.  Thank you again for your time and we do hope to see you again.

Summary: This La Quinta was clean and room was nice. It is right next to the 405 highway and can be noisy....ask for room away from freeway. Parking is a bit tight so if you have a large vehicle you need to park in the back.

Love La quinta they never let my family down. Love this Hotel. :) Great breakfast  great business center for your work needs, always leave happy relaxed and satisfied. As a gold member the perks are always the icing on the cake.

Key cards did not work, and had to be redone a couple of times. We were told that they were extra sensitive. Never really had this problem at a hotel. Also showers outdated and unsafe. Parking lot dominated by big trucks taking up multiple parking spaces. Noisy late night visitors.
Manager Response: I appreciate your feedback; this is definitely not the experience we want you to have when staying with us! Your feedback will help us improve our operation. As the new General Manager for the property this helps us focus on what issues need to be addressed apart from those we are already.     Rest assured your comments will be shared with our team, and it’s through comments such as yours that we’re able to improve. Thanks again for your time, and hope we’ll see you back with us at La Quinta Inn once again.

Summary: Paper thin walls, hookers, weed, loud 15 noise next to biker bar and hooters. Stained floors dirty bathroom saggy bed so dirty slept with my clothes on on top of bedding stayed less than 8 hours. No fridge mircrowave, beat up dryer outside on terrace. Yuck.
Manager Response: Thank you for filling out a survey of your stay here with us at La Quinta Costa Mesa.  We appreciate you taking the time to let us know how we can do better and where we need to improve.  We do share the parking lot not with a "Denny's" as you may have seen with other properties but the restaurant next to us is a "Hooters" which is a sports bar.  They do at times tend to be a little loud because of the games and the fans that come watch them.  My apologies that you did not get a suite with a microwave/fridge.  we do have them available at a higher price than the rooms that do not have them.  Those rooms also are the first to sell so next time you are in the area give us a call.  We might be able to get you in to one of those if they are available.  My apologies for the cleanliness issues of the floors you experienced.  The weather and the rain has made it difficult to get to all the rooms and since we are an exterior property they carpets tend to get stained quicker than an interior hotel.  I did share your comments with the Team and we will continue to take care of those issues.  As of last week the washer/dryer has been taken care of and is no longer an eye soar.  Again we thank you for your comments and as the new General Manager appreciate your help.  Hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Basic room at a good price for the Orange County area. Could use a few inexpensive bells and whistles, such as a microwave oven, USB charge station, luggage rack, clothes hook in bathroom, otherwise good nights stay.
Manager Response: It is nice to read your comments and suggestions.  We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us here at the La Quinta Costa Mesa/John Wayne Airport.  We do have some rooms that do have the Microwave/Fridge.  Not all the rooms have those items but a few do at a higher price.  Those are however the first we sell out of during high peak days.  We will look into the rest of your suggestions as guest point of view is our focus for a great stay. Thank you again

Summary: Booked this hotel though la quinta reservations for one night because it was close to our airport.  It is old.  Staff is friendly, next door to hooters and come night ime is the noisest hotel we have ever been in.  It was nasty! So much so i slept in my clothea on top of the covers.  Smells like weed, and mold, saw several say extercirrucial activities, if you can put two and two together from the establisment next door.  It is a bad area of town did not feel safe secure and the mold and weed exacerbated asthma.  We got in a 7pm and left at 4am.  And were happy to do so.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to comment about your resent stay with us here at La Quinta John Wayne Airport.  I am deeply sadden to hear that you had an unpleasant stay.  I have shared your comments with the team and as the new manager will be working on making sure your issues are addressed so they are not repeated.

Summary: Very good location and the price is very reasonable. Clean, Friendly and Quiet. Breakfast is good and there are several restaurants very close.  providing quite a variety of choices for dinner. Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: We are pleased you enjoyed your stay with us here at the La Quinta Costa Mesa.  We have great rates and our location is central to many venues.  Our breakfast is great with fresh waffles and many different breads and cereals as well as coffee and juices.  We look forward to being able to serve you again.

Summary: Everything I read previously was true, but I travel with a dog and like La Quinta. This hotel is noisy, very thin walls, etc. but the bed was very comfortable. There was foot traffic at all hours, someone  talking on their phone outside my room and someone else knocking on a neighbors door at 3:30 am, over and over. The shower would only dribble so I ended up on my knees using water from the faucet and didn't wash my hair. Not a restful night. If I return, I'll be sure to have ear plugs.
Manager Response: Thanks for your comments regarding your stay. We’re sorry about the experiences you’ve mentioned. Having a comfortable and quite room is very important and I’m sorry you did not sleep well.  Would you mind contacting us at lq0541gm@lqreviews.com so we may discuss with you personally? We appreciate your feedback and hope to hear from you soon!

Summary Heading: Idk what to say of this place
Summary: I stayed here for 1 night i loved the cheap rates and no extra charges for pets but the only things i didn't like was that the first room we got the t.v. did not work and we switched to the room next door and then the shower had no hot water and this is at the la quinta inn and in the morning at the breakfast i walked my dog in the lobby and the maintenance guy demands me to "get out" of the lobby with my dog he wanted me out though and the lady at the front desk did not mind my dog at all but the maintenence guy did not treat me with any respect at all he again demanded me to "get out" of my previous room and to "shut the door", i like the hotel i just dont like some of the rude staff they really need to step up their attitude and their professionalism.
Manager Response: Thanks for your comments regarding your stay. We’re sorry about the experiences you’ve mentioned, and your comments are concerning to us. We take service quite seriously, and we’d like to better understand what happened during your stay. Would you mind contacting us at lq0541gm@lqreviews.com so we may discuss with you personally? We appreciate your feedback and hope to hear from you soon!

Summary Heading: Have had better stays in this hotel
Summary: The room was alright, although we thought we were getting the suite with couch and bedroom in other room which is what I asked for and did not get, the shower was very hard to get to work, had to ask my husband for help and he had a hard time also, and the outlets where the coffee pot was did not work. We have stayed at this hotel many times and only one other time did we complain. we ended up getting a refund that time. Very dirty room, globs of hair by bed and shower was filthy.

This hotel is a nightmare! It's dirty, dirty, dirty! The room smelled like 30 day old smoke and musk. The carpet was very stained ,felt hard with dirt, and definitely unworthy of walking on WITH slippers. Very noisy, and the phone wires were cut in this room. did call the front desk on my cell to inform them. They did send over a maintenance man to repair the line. However nothing outside of a total overhaul can get the property sleep worthy!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. This is definitely not the kind of experience we want our guests to have. I'm so sorry about the issues you encountered which didn’t meet your standards.  I apologize.  Rest assured your comments are taken to heart and we will do everything we can to improve. Sincerely, LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: A reasonably priced and satisfacitory pet-friendly hotel
Summary: Value-priced, but clean and satisfactory.  Nice buffet breakfast, and plenty of lawn for dog-walking.  Staff was efficient and friendly.  Computer in lobby near front door.  Location was driving-close to nearby stores and businesses.

Summary Heading: Great value for an Orange County Hotel
Summary: The La Quinta Inn Orange County is much like what you would find at a Holiday Inn Express or Marriott Courtyard.  The hotel was clean and neat.   The staff was highly accommodating.   The major plus to this hotel is price for value while being centrally located.  It is a straight 3 to 5 minute drive to South Coast Plaza.... a short hop to Newport Beach and Huntington Beach.   I have no hesitation recommending this hotel and would definitely stay at it again.

not the best choice or location..very loud. no impact windows, and there next to the freeway..and a Hooters.  Food choice horrible..Still no hot eggs, bacon, protein etc., room need an update. carpet needed cleaning
Manager Response: Thank you for your response.  Unfortunately we are next to the freeway however the rooms on that side do have double pained windows to help with the noise.  We are also making sure the doors and AC's have their seal checked to also help block out those freeway noises.  Our Continental Breakfast does not have the bacon and hot eggs you were looking for but we do have Fresh waffles, Bagels, breads, muffins, cereals, OJ and Apple juice, milk, coffee, tea and oatmeal that you can choose from.  It is from 6AM to 9AM. For lunch and or dinner besides the sport bar next door, Hooters,  we are near South Coast Plaza Mall and other restaurants in the area.  Currently we are heading up a carpet cleaning project that is improving the carpet conditions and helps with odor.  Being an exterior property keeping those carpets clean is a task we will improve on.  Thank you again for your suggestions and comments.  We appreciate you taking the time to let us know where we can get better.

Summary: dont waste you time with this hotel they wont fix any issues and refuse to return your money is you chose to leave. toilets dont work right, room had a strange smell that i couldnt take. very bad customer service.
Manager Response: Thanks for your comments regarding your stay. We’re sorry about the experiences you’ve mentioned, and your comments are concerning to us. We take service and cleanliness quite seriously, and we’d like to better understand what happened during your stay. Would you mind contacting us at lq0541gm@lqreviews.com so we may discuss with you personally? We appreciate your feedback and hope to hear from you soon!

Summary: DO not stay here...room 238- was like a dirt motel 6, mold, dirty floors and walls, non working outlets, AC wires exposed, huge gaps in the front door- which allowed all noise and air to come in. I normally stay at Embassy suites and once in a while we stay at LA Quinta because they are nice hotels but this one was not. Don't be fooled by their photos. The guest service people were really nice and fast however they must also clean those rooms too fast.
Manager Response: Thanks for your comments regarding your stay. We’re sorry about the experiences you’ve mentioned, and your comments are concerning to us. We take service and cleanliness quite seriously, and we’d like to better understand what happened during your stay. Would you mind contacting us at lq0541gm@lqreviews.com so we may discuss with you personally? We appreciate your feedback and hope to hear from you soon!

Summary: Great for an overnight.  This hotel is nosy from the freeway.  If you need a place to stay for a night or two this is the place.  The pool are was lovely.  The hotel is next to Hooters and not from Ikea and South Coast Plaza.  Great place for stop over.  We had a lovely room with king size bed and another room with living room.  We didn't eat the breakfast because we didn't have time. Our other family members stay in double queen beds room which also was good but their room was on the outside.  The elevator is not central to all rooms.  If you have a room in the middle of hotel then the elevator is great should you have a room on the outer side of the hotel is it a hike from the elevator.

Great value and great location...We have stayed at different hotels in the area and La Quinta Inn has definitely surpassed the others in quality!! Thanks La Quinta Inn for the Great Stay!!!! See you soon....

Summary Heading: Near College Hosting Indigent Health Clinic
Summary: Reception staff members were welcoming and helpful. The location and room facilities met my needs. There were many choices of restaurants nearby. Breakfast choices weere good. I would probabaly return to this venue on a succeeding trip.

The building exteriors and rooms are sadly in need of upgrades. The beds were also uncomfortable along with musty rooms that also had that lingering cigarette smoke odor. I get that this is a mid-priced hotel, but when you feel like moisture in the rooms are clinging to you and the carpet...it's pretty gross
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback. We’re sorry the hotel did not meet your expectations. We’ll share your comments with our staff so that we may improve our operation and prevent similar situations from happening to other travelers. We appreciate you sharing your feedback with our team.
